detailedDescription:
The last remaining 4-bedroom house - with 129 sq.m internal area over 2 floors & a private garden and parking is available for £542,500 - don't miss out

Built to a high-quality specification
All homes at the Quarry have been built to an excellent standard with a high quality specification throughout.

Kitchen
• Individually designed contemporary kitchens with soft close doors and drawers

• Under Cabinet LED lighting

• Laminate worktop with matching upstands.

• Stainless steel splashback behind hob

• Stainless steel 11/2 bowl sink with chrome mixer tap

• Fully integrated appliances including oven, induction hob, integrated extractor, fridge freezer, dishwasher, and washer dryer

• Houses include combi-microwave/oven

• The Elms house type has a separate washer, dryer, fridge and freezer

Special attention has been paid to the private outdoor space that all homes enjoy, preserving sight-lines of the natural scenery.

Buy your new home in Erith, Bexley
The Quarry is a truly impressive eco-development breathing new life into the disused Erith Quarry site, which has been neglected for over 30 years. The scheme is being transformed into a collection of 1,2,3 and 4 bedroom homes, released across several phases. The development will include a new open space, a new primary school, community facilities, and will retain ecological areas complementing the existing landscape.

London Help to Buy with L&Q at The Quarry
With sustainability at its heart, this innovatively designed development will bring to market high quality, considered homes available with London Help to Buy. As well as educational & community spaces which encourage nature and build on the ecology of the site. Located just 40 minutes by train from Central London and easily accessible for the planned Crossrail line from Abbey Wood and Woolwich stations.

The Anderson Group
The Quarry is a joint venture between L&Q and The Anderson Group. Founded by Mark Anderson in 1987, The Anderson Group has built an enviable reputation over the past 30 years, through their work in taking lost land and creating new communities.

Their expertise and capability as a construction company enables them to make informed proposals, and their structure as a private business means they can make decisions with confidence. This means that every client gets the high quality service that they deserve.

An Ideal Family home is offered in the shape of this extended 3 Bedroom Semi - detached Freehold House that is located in a popular road in Upper Belvedere.

detailedDescription:
Take a look at this stunning three bedroom link semi detached family home set within this quiet location.

This home comprises to the ground floor a bright and airy open plan lounge and dining room which gives access to the rear garden, great sized kitchen with plenty of storage space and also a downstairs W.C. To the first floor you have three great sized bedrooms and a modern fitted family bathroom too.

Externally this home offers off street parking to the front, garage to the side and a lovely garden to the rear which is part paved and part lawn. This home is maintained to a wonderful standard which really is a credit to the current owner.

Erith & Northumberland Heath are adjacent neighbourhoods enjoying close proximity to Bexley borough’s main thoroughfare, Bexleyheath Broadway. Firmly residential, Northumberland Heath is a quiet enclave with some charming Victorian properties and a small village-like centre.

Erith is a larger town that has undergone rejuvenation in recent years, with a revamped town centre, a waterfront setting (home to London’s longest pier) and an ambitious house building programme. Don’t miss the annual Erith Riverside Festival.

agency_name: James Gorey Estate Agents - South East London and North Kent
detailedDescription:
Guide £675,000 - £700,000.

One of the most desired roads in Abbey Wood, New Road passes through the historic Lesnes Abbey Woods with its spectacular array of seasonal-changing colours and wildlife; a truly beautiful spot in South East London. This home is situated on arguably the better end of New Road as you're just a 0.2 mile walk to Abbey Wood Train Station, where the eagerly anticipated CrossRail is set to open next year.

The property oozes with kerb appeal with it's beautiful exterior of Victorian-style Character featuring imposing bay windows with conical-roof design above the master bedroom, and boasts a Driveway providing Off Road Parking with plenty of space for two cars.

The accommodation comprises a Porch, a welcoming Entrance Hall with high ceilings in keeping with the character of the build continuing throughout much of this home. There is a 27' Through-Lounge filled with natural light, and two chimney breasts add to the aesthetics of the room. The family-sized Kitchen Diner features an integrated oven and hobs, space for appliances, and a utility cupboard housing a combi-boiler and plumbing for washing machine. Moving upstairs, the property offers a spacious Landing, a family bathroom consisting of a 3pc suite, and Three Bedrooms of generous proportions (the master bedroom measures an impressive 18' x 14'4).

Accessed via the Kitchen is a beautiful, well-tended Rear Garden of over 90, and south-westerly facing; your very own paradise in this corner of London. There's plenty of lawn, plus flower beds and shrubs, trees, and a storage shed.

Several houses in this street and local area have added extra living and bedroom space including conservatories, extensions, and loft conversions. With all that space in the garden expanding this home shouldn't cause too much of a dent in your outdoor space. (Subject to the necessary planning permissions, of course.)

If you've not been to Abbey Wood before, we highly recommend a visit, not only to come and see this great home, but also to explore this charming town and it's gardens, parks, multiple woods, ponds, Lesnes Abbey Ruins, the lake, nearby nature reserves and plenty more.

You'll also have a choice of several Supermarkets nearby, and the property falls under the catchment of 'Good' Ofsted rated primary schools, and bus routes provide good access for several secondary schools.

Book your viewing here today, call James Gorey Estate Agents now before it's gone!

detailedDescription:
Whether looking for yourself or on behalf of a loved-one, you can be assured there's plenty of reasons to buy here in Fern Court; a highly desirable Retirement Development, just metres from Bexleyheath Town Centre offering an abundance of shopping, dining and entertainment, and a great hub for bus routes too.

The development benefits from an on-site Warden (Mon-Fri 9am - 5pm), emergency pull-cord system (wearable pendants are also available), and communal facilities including Laundry Room, Parking, and Residents Lounge. Resident events are one of the great elements to retirement accommodation giving an excellent opportunity for social contact and friendships (please note, such events are currently restricted due to the pandemic.)

From the street or car-park, enter the building via secure Entryphone System into the communal halls, take the lift or stairs to the second floor where you'll find the apartment. Into the Entrance Hall there is a storage cupboard (with electric meter and consumer unit), and an airing cupboard housing the hot water tank. The Lounge / Diner offers plenty of floor space for living room and dining comforts, and provides access to the Kitchen which has space for two appliances and built in oven and hobs. Both Bedrooms are double in size, and each come with fitted wardrobes. There is also a Shower Room with wash basin, low level WC and a walk-in shower cubicle ideal for mobility needs. The property comes with Electric Heating and Double Glazing.

The development is exclusive to the over 60s, or for couples where one is 60+ and the other 55+ years of age.

We understand the property is Leasehold and has a remaining lease length of 98 years, and the service charge for the 6-month period 01/03/21 - 31/08/21 is £1592.21, and the ground rent is £582.44 pa. This information should be verified by your solicitor prior to exchanging contracts.

We recommend booking your viewing asap! Contact James Gorey Estate Agents Today to arrange your appointment!

detailedDescription:
Guide Price £600,000 -£650,000

Enviably located in one of the most popular residential roads in Bexley Village, this beautiful four bedroom semi detached family home with off street parking, garage and delightful mature private garden. Enjoying a pleasant view to the front over open land with the River Shuttle running through, the property provides light and spacious accommodation with modern interiors and high quality finish throughout. Features include an inviting front aspect reception room, superb open plan kitchen/dining room leading through to a sunny orangery/conservatory, separate utility, first floor bathroom, ground floor WC, gas central heating, double glazing, ample inbuilt storage and quality floor coverings.

Accommodation comprises a wide entrance hallway with access to guest WC and stairs rising to the first floor, leading into the bright and spacious front aspect reception room with attractive square bay window and feature fireplace. To the rear of the property, the beautiful kitchen/diner provides wonderful family living space, as well as open plan access through to the orangery to the rear, with overhead skylight and garden views. The kitchen area itself comprises a modern range of matching wall and base units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit, range style cooker, and further space for appliances. A utility room provides additional work/appliance space, as well as access to both the garage and garden. To the first floor, there are four well proportioned bedrooms - the larger three with extensive inbuilt wardrobe space - plus a family bathroom with bath suite, and separate shower unit. Outside you have a non over looked mature rear garden with a fully functional summer house and store shed.

To book a viewing instantly just visit our website or download our award-winning App.

Location

The property is pleasantly located between Bexleyheath and Bexley, within easy access of Albany Park and Bexley stations, each with excellent links into Central London. Bexley itself provides an array of shops, bars, restaurants and amenities, and the area is well served by good local schools and open spaces. The A2 and M25 are also close-by for excellent vehicular access, and it is only a short drive to Bluewater Shopping Centre offering an array of shops, restaurants and leisure facilities including a cinema complex.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

Located on the south side of Bexleyheath is this stunning victorian mid terrace home which has been lovingly cared for and updated by the current owners allowing the next lucky owner to simply move in, un pack and relax in there new home!

The property is located on Oaklands Road which is a very sought after road giving you great access to local schools, shops, transport and A2/M25 links.

The accommodation on offer comprises of an entrance porch which then leads in to an entrance hall, the lounge is to the front of the home and is bay fronted, this not only adds to the character of the home but also offers a little extra space.

To the middle of the property is a cosy sitting room, this could also be used as a study or play room area if preferred, from here you can then access the large kitchen/dining room, this is certainly the heart of the home and really does offer a great sense of space, this then leads in to the utility room as well as the rear garden.

To the first floor the space continues with two good size bedrooms and a large family bathroom which was a bedroom when the current owners first moved in.

Externally there is a good size rear garden which a secured shingled area to the rear which provides space for a couple of sheds, if preferred this area could even be used for off road parking if needed.

On top of all this the property also has planning permission granted for a loft conversion which would add an additional double bedroom along with an en suite shower room.

This really is a great property and i'm sure will gain a lot of interest, to not miss out call anthony martin today to view!

detailedDescription:
Securing this property with A lifetime lease


Lifetime Lease guide price for Over 60s: £416,500 based on an average saving of 33%Over 60 Customers can save anywhere from 8.5% to 59%*.
Market Value Price: £630,000

Through the Home for Life Plan from Homewise, those aged 60 or over can purchase a Lifetime Lease with a one-off payment to become the Lifetime Lease owner of this property. The cost to purchase the Lifetime Lease is always less than the full market value. The saving can vary from 8.5% to 59%* depending on your age, personal circumstances and property criteria. detailedDescription:
Beautifully presented four/five bedroom semi detached family home situated on the Bexleyheath and Belvedere Borders. The property has been lovingly maintained during the sellers 24 years of occupancy and thoughtfully extended but still has potential to extend further should you wish (sstp).
The accommodation on offer comprises a spacious lounge, kitchen/diner, 2nd reception/Bedroom five and bathroom on the ground floor. Off of the spacious landing you will find a further three double bedrooms and a good size single with Bedroom One having the benefit of an en-suite shower room. Externally there are large rear and side gardens and ample off road parking to the front.
Located within easy reach of Bedonwell, Belmont and Lesnes Primary Schools and good transport links to the local grammar schools this would make an ideal home for a young and growing family. The property is ideally located for Nuxley Village and local amenities and for those who love woodland walks you have ancient Lesnes Woods and Abbey Ruins, Bostall Woods and Heath all within easy reach.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautiful one bedroom, second floor apartment benefitting from having a walk-out-balcony and a bright southerly aspect. Sydney Court offers everything for a relaxing and safe retirement with a little extra help when needed. From enjoying the restaurant and freshly prepared meals daily, socializing in the communal lounge or seating areas in the stunning landscaped gardens to being pampered in the Wellness Suite.

Summary

Sydney Court is a Retirement Living Plus development built by McCarthy & Stone, designed specifically for the over 70s, for those who wish to enjoy independent living but may need some extra care and support. There is an Estate Manager who leads the team and oversees the development. This apartment features Oak veneered doors throughtout, a fully fitted kitchen with neff appliances, underfloor heating, fitted and tiled shower room with level access shower and a 24 hour emergency call system.

Communal facilities include a homeowners lounge where social events and activities take place, a function room and a landscaped courtyard. There is a fully equipped laundry room and bistro-style restaurant that serves freshly prepared meals daily. If your guests wish to stay, there is guest suite accommodation which can be booked (fees apply). There are lifts to all levels in the building, mobility scooter store and wellbeing suite. There is a 24 hour emergency call system provided by a personal pendant and call points in your bedroom and bathroom as well as onsite management 24 hours a day.

One hour of domestic support per week is included in the service charge at Sydney Court with additional services including care and support available at an extra charge. However, this can be from as little as 15 minutes per session which can be increased or decreased to suit your needs.

Sydney Court backs on to Waring Park with beautiful views. There is an Arts and Adult Education Centre at the end of the road. The main Station Road, with restaurants and shops, is nearby, and Sidcup railway station is less than ½ a mile away. You can catch direct trains to London Charing Cross and Cannon Street, as well as Lewisham and Woolwich there is also a good local bus service.

Entrance Hall

Front door with spy hole leads to the large entrance hall - the 24-hour Tunstall emergency response pull cord system is situated in the hall. From the hallway there is a door to a walk-in storage cupboard/airing cupboard. Illuminated light switches, smoke detector, apartment security door entry system with intercom and emergency pull cord located in the hall. Doors lead to the bedroom, living room and shower room.

Living Room With Balcony

A bright, well-proportioned lounge with double glazed patio door with windows to the side leading onto the balcony and a Southerly aspect. TV and telephone points, Sky/Sky+ connection point. Two ceiling lights. Fitted carpets, raised electric power sockets. Partially glazed door leads onto a separate kitchen.

Kitchen

Fully tiled and fitted kitchen with a range of modern low and eye level units and drawers with contrasting work surfaces. UPVC double glazed window. Stainless steel sink with mono lever tap and drainer. Neff waist level oven, ceramic hob, cooker hood and integral fridge freezer and under pelmet lighting.

Bedroom

Spacious double bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe housing rails and shelving. Ceiling lights, TV and phone point.

Shower Room

Fully tiled with non-slip resistant floor tiling, walk-in with level access shower. Underfloor heating and grab rails. WC and Vanity unit with sink mirror, heated towel rail, and shaver socket. Emergency pull cord.

Service Charge (Breakdown)

• Cleaning of communal windows
• Water rates for communal areas and apartments
• Electricity, heating, lighting and power to communal areas
• 24-hour emergency call system
• Upkeep of gardens and grounds
• Repairs and maintenance to the interior and exterior communal areas
• Contingency fund including internal and external redecoration of communal areas
• Buildings insurance
The service charge does not cover external costs such as your Council Tax, electricity or TV, but does include the cost of your Estates Manager, your water rates, the 24-hour emergency call system, the heating and maintenance of all communal areas, exterior property maintenance and gardening. To find out more about service charges please contact your Property Consultant or Estates Manager.

Leasehold

Lease 999 Years from 2017
Ground Rent £495. Pa

The accommodation on offer comprises entrance hall, extended lounge, open plan high spec fully fitted kitchen/diner, shower room/toilet and utility to the ground floor. To the first floor is a landing giving access to not one but four double bedrooms and a large modern family bathroom.

Each town has its own High Street, with local businesses and supermarkets.

Commuters use Sidcup train station for a direct service into Central London, with journey times from 18 minutes. Both Sidcup and Blackfen are brimming with pubs and restaurants, with friendly ‘locals’ serving the community.

detailedDescription:
*** guide price £260,000 ***

*** chain free ***

Offered to the market is this charming two double bedroom, purpose built third floor flat. The property is situated on a popular development within Belvedere and is within walking distance to Belvedere train station, which is perfect for commuters who need easy access into London. The property is ideally suited to first time buyers looking to get onto the property ladder and benefit from a modern day flat.

The property offers a contemporary open plan arrangement with a spacious kitchen, lounge and dining area incorporated together. The space is complemented by the inclusion of a central island. This unique addition is an ideal space for meal prep and the perfect spot for friends and family to gather around. With a view overlooking the stunning communal gardens, this apartment’s balcony is a perfect place to kick back and relax. On this development a restaurant and a local Travelodge can be found if you can’t hold all of your guests for the evening.

The property offers an en suite shower room to the master bedroom and a spacious family bathroom off the hallway with the second bedroom situated close by.

There is allocated parking too and plenty of parking locally for any guests who wish to enjoy your new property with you.

calling all first buyers and buy to let investors, Do we have a treat for you!

New to the market is this rarely available ground floor maisonette which is located on Hawthorn Road on the south side of Bexleyheath, the location is second to none and gives access to everything you could possibly need, from The Broadway, to transport and even giving easy access to A2/M25 links.

The property is being sold chain free making this either ready to move into or available to rent out straight away with an income of £900pcm.

The property also comes with the freehold of the building which will give the new owner the freedom to look after the building how they choose as well as not having to have high service charges.

The accommodation on offer comprises of an entrance hall which gives access to all of the rooms as well as having a good size storage cupboard, the lounge is to the front of the property and is bay fronted, this not only adds to the character of the room but also gives it a little extra space.

The bedroom is to the middle of the property, this also benefits from having a built in wardrobe, to the rear of the property is the kitchen, this is a good size which has room for a small dining table if preferred.

The bathroom is then off a lobby area, again the bathroom is a really good size room and also has a large storage cupboard which houses the modern boiler.

Externally there is a rear garden which is your own outdoor space, ideal for those summer BBQ's.

This really is a great property, set in a lovely road.

Call anthony martn now to view!

address: Sydney Court, Lansdown Road, Sidcup DA14
detailedDescription:
A stunning one bedroom, second floor apartment benefitting from having access onto a balcony with a south easterly aspect and its own allocated car parking space. Sydney Court is a Retirement Living Plus development offering everything from a secure and safe lifestyle, freshly prepared meals daily from it's stunning reataurant, a wonderful community environment, social activities in the communal lounge, hairdressing salon and wellness suite and a guest suite if family or friends wish to stop over to the 24 hour staffing, on call via the emergency call buttons and pull cords and can provide extra care packages if needed.

Sydney Court is a Retirement Living Plus development built by McCarthy & Stone, designed specifically for the over 70s, for those who wish to enjoy independent living but may need some extra care and support. There is an Estate Manager who leads the team and oversees the development. This apartment features Oak veneered doors throughtout, a fully fitted kitchen with neff appliances, underfloor heating, fitted and tiled shower room with level access shower and a 24 hour emergency call system.

Communal facilities include a homeowners lounge where social events and activities take place, a function room and a landscaped courtyard. There is a fully equipped laundry room and bistro-style restaurant that serves freshly prepared meals daily. If your guests wish to stay, there is guest suite accommodation which can be booked (fees apply). There are lifts to all levels in the building, mobility scooter store and wellbeing suite. There is a 24 hour emergency call system provided by a personal pendant and call points in your bedroom and bathroom as well as onsite management 24 hours a day.

One hour of domestic support per week is included in the service charge at Sydney Court with additional services including care and support available at an extra charge. However, this can be from as little as 15 minutes per session which can be increased or decreased to suit your needs.

Sydney Court backs on to Waring Park with beautiful views. There is an Arts and Adult Education Centre at the end of the road. The main Station Road, with restaurants and shops, is nearby, and Sidcup railway station is less than ½ a mile away. You can catch direct trains to London Charing Cross and Cannon Street, as well as Lewisham and Woolwich there is also a good local bus service.

Entrance Hall

Front door with spy hole leads to the large entrance hall - the 24-hour Tunstall emergency response pull cord system is situated in the hall. From the hallway there is a door to a walk-in storage cupboard/airing cupboard. Illuminated light switches, smoke detector, apartment security door entry system with intercom and emergency pull cord located in the hall. Doors lead to the bedroom, lounge and shower room.

Lounge With Patio Door To Balcony

A well-proportioned lounge with double glazed patio door to balcony. TV and telephone points, Sky/Sky+ connection point. Two ceiling lights. Fitted carpets, raised electric power sockets. Partially glazed door leads onto a separate kitchen.

Kitchen

Fully tiled and fitted kitchen with a range of modern low and eye level units and drawers with contrasting work surface. UPVC double glazed window with a south easterly aspect. Stainless steel sink with mono lever tap and drainer. Neff waist level oven and microwave oven, ceramic hob, cooker hood and integral fridge freezer. Bosch dishwasher and under pelmet lighting.

Bedroom

Spacious double bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe housing rails and shelving. Ceiling lights, TV and phone point.

Shower Room

Fully tiled with non-slip resistant floor tiling, walk-in with level access shower. Underfloor heating and grab rails. WC and Vanity unit with sink mirror, heated towel rail, and shaver socket. Emergency pull cord.

Service Charge

• Cleaning of communal windows
• Water rates for communal areas and apartments
• Electricity, heating, lighting and power to communal areas
• 24-hour emergency call system
• Upkeep of gardens and grounds
• Repairs and maintenance to the interior and exterior communal areas
• Contingency fund including internal and external redecoration of communal areas
• Buildings insurance
The service charge does not cover external costs such as your Council Tax, electricity or TV, but does include the cost of your Estates Manager, your water rates, the 24-hour emergency call system, the heating and maintenance of all communal areas, exterior property maintenance and gardening. To find out more about service charges please contact your Property Consultant or Estates Manager.

Leasehold

Lease 999 Years from 2017

Ground Rent £495. Pa

NHBC 10 Year warranty from 2017

Car Parking

This apartment has its own allocated car parking space.

Securing this property with A lifetime lease


Lifetime Lease guide price for Over 60s: £198,500 based on an average saving of 33%Over 60 Customers can save anywhere from 8.5% to 59%*.
Market Value Price: £300,000

Through the Home for Life Plan from Homewise, those aged 60 or over can purchase a Lifetime Lease with a one-off payment to become the Lifetime Lease owner of this property. The cost to purchase the Lifetime Lease is always less than the full market value. The saving can vary from 8.5% to 59%* depending on your age, personal circumstances and property criteria. The above guide price is the estimated price payable by a 69-year-old single male. For an indication of what you could save, please use our calculator on the Homewise website (see link below). For more information or a personalised quote, just give us a call. Alternatively, if you are under 60 or would like to purchase the property at the full market value of £300,000, please contact Wards.

** Guide Price £900,000 - £925,000 **

Acorn are truly delighted to welcome to the market this unique and large Semi Detached family home, located on a sought after road in South Bexleyheath.

Offered to the market in good order, the ground floor accommodation comprises two WC's, large storage/lean to area, integral garage which could be used as a further reception room, bright family/entertaining room, secondary front reception room and a spacious open plan kitchen diner with ample fitted kitchen units.

The first floor houses the family bathroom and six well proportioned bedrooms. The Master Bedroom benefitting from an en suite bathroom complete with corner tub and separate shower enclosure, and Bedroom 6 offering its very own reception room/study overlooking the rear garden. Mount Road is located in desirable South Bexleyheath.

address: Jefferies Lodge, 48-60 Footscray Road, London SE9
detailedDescription:
*** retirement apartment ***
Plot 17 is a two bedroom apartment on the first floor and includes a second WC, includes carpets, curtains, light fittings
This beautiful apartment comes with a fully fitted kitchen, spacious living room, separate shower room and a large bedroom.

The kitchen has been designed for practicality, with a fitted fridge, freezer and a waist-height oven to save bending down. There’s also an integral washer/dryer fitted. The bedroom comes complete with fitted wardrobes as well as TV and telephone points, with even the smallest details considered.

About the Development

This stunning retirement development of one and two bedroom apartments is in a fantastic, central location, close to all the essential amenities and public transport. Jefferies Lodge is home to 38 apartments and includes an Owners' Lounge with a built-in coffee bar, creating the perfect location for socialising with like-minded neighbours. The development is within easy reach of the local shops, supermarkets and tourist attractions, so you can enjoy an independent, active retirement.

Social and communal lifestyle

Communal gardens are carefully landscaped, giving you the perfect place to relax and enjoy an afternoon cup of tea, without having to worry about the maintenance and upkeep that a large garden so often demands. The carefully designed Owners’ Lounge comes complete with a coffee bar and is a popular feature, providing the perfect venue for entertaining, participating in activities organised by your Lodge Manager, or just relaxing with a book. Events include everything from fish and chip suppers, to tea dances, giving you the chance to socialise as much as you like throughout the year.

The fully furnished Guest Suite provides an ideal space for your family and friends to stay over when visiting, while a lift to all floors is installed for your convenience.

Safety and security

This apartment comes complete with a 24 hour emergency Careline system, while a camera entry system is installed as standard, so you can feel safe and secure in your retirement. Intruder alarms and fire alarm systems are fitted throughout the Lodge, while a Lodge Manager is on hand to assist you with anything else you might need. EPC Grade B. Please note that all particulars and images are for marketing and illustrative purposes only. Advertising images may include upgrades as home specifications can vary.

detailedDescription:
This 2016 development is conveniently located for Blackfen, Eltham, Sidcup and within walking distance of Falconwood train station. It is situated in a quiet neighbourhood and a large parade with a variety of shops can be found just across the road, as well as the stunning Avery Hill Park and direct bus connections to Blackheath and North Greenwich.

The well-maintained property briefly comprises a large open plan lounge, leading to a fully fitted kitchen with modern appliances, two bedrooms with an en-suite to the very spacious master bedroom and a good-sized family bathroom.

The development's large communal garden is well looked-after and offers lots of opportunities for parties, playtime, BBQ and so on.

Parking spaces are available on a first-come, first-served basis, with plenty of on-street parking on Rennets Wood Road as well.

The ground floor has an ample reception room, separate dining room and either a 5th bedroom or ground floor office. The new and high quality kitchen and utility room lead to either the rear or the huge double garage which we feel could also be included and woven into the house STPP.

detailedDescription:
The ever popular Fern court Retirement Apartments is the location for this bright and spacious ground floor property, located in this sought after development close to Bexleyheath Broadway.

Offered to the market in good order, Fern Court offers communal laundry and residents lounge . The apartment comprises of two double bedrooms that both look out to the communal gardens, modern shower room with walk in shower cubicle, large lounge diner and kitchen with fitted units. The lounge/dining room is also the access point for the outside garden area. This is ideal in the summer as you can have the doors open all day long.

The property is located within walking distance to the Broadway with an array of shops, restaurants and cafes are within walking distance, as well as several bus routes. There is also a number of supermarkets to get your weekly shop.

detailedDescription:
Ref: Kherf

***call now to book your slot***

Tyron Ash Real Estate are delighted to present to market this beautiful two large bedroom apartment, located walking distance to transport links and benefits from local amenities as well as a large communal roof terrace.

The apartment comes with large open-plan reception/kitchen, two double bedrooms both of which come with built in wardrobes, a large open plan living space and family bathroom, communal roof terrace and secure gated residents parking.

Built only 5 years ago, the property has been well located after and presents as if new, whilst also backed up by the remaining 5 years of NHBC guarantee.

This is a great investment opportunity for an investor, or to get yourself onto the property ladder. For more information please contact Tyron Ash Real Estate.

Location
Bexleyheath is home to the borough’s largest shopping facility, where you’ll find high-street names, and supermarkets. There’s a bowling alley, a cinema, Crook Log Leisure Centre, regular specialist markets and family-friendly restaurants too.

Families are also attracted to Bexleyheath for the schooling – with two of the borough’s grammars and excellent primaries close by. The Red House – an Arts & Crafts property designed for the artist and socialist William Morris - is Bexleyheath’s premier cultural attraction.

Full description Offered to the market is this large and well extended detached period house. Large period houses such as this are rarely available in Sidcup and this will be sure to get interest. It boast plenty of space and character throughout and sits in such a desirable road which offers easy access to Sidcup train station, Sidcup High Street and some very sought after schools. This amazing house is set back nicely from the road offering an in and out driveway for several cars and we feel ticks so many boxes to make it the complete family home for someone to put their stamp on.

Externally the property has a large in/out driveway with parking for several cars to the front and garage to the side. The rear garden is laid to lawn with large patio area.

Houses of this size and with this much character sitting in one of Sidcup's most desirable roads are hard to come by so your earliest appointment is a must to avoid missing out.

Offered to the market with no chain, the property does require updating but consists of three bedrooms; 27ft lounge with feature fire place, shower room, fitted kitchen and lean to stretching the length of the bungalow..

Penpool Lane is located within a short stroll of Welling High Street, with an array of shops, cafes and two major supermarkets; and Welling Station. The picturesque Danson Park, with it's fantastic boating lake and restaurants, is just set behind the property.

Acorn are delighted to present this excellent one bedroom first floor flat situated on the borders of Welling and Crook log, with access to Danson Park and Welling High Street.

This accommodation comprises one double bedroom, large reception room, modern fully fitted kitchen including white goods and modern three piece bathroom. The flat also comes with an allocated parking space.

Welling is a residential area with popular schools and a central high street offering everything you would expect, including a wide range of supermarkets, shops, restaurants, pubs and bus routes to surrounding areas including Bexleyheath, Blackheath, Bluewater and Abbey Wood with the up and coming Crossrail Network. Welling Station offers direct links to London Bridge, Charing Cross, Cannon Street, Waterloo East & Victoria. Danson Park is a local family favourite with the historic Danson House and boating lake.

If working from home is now on the agenda we have a fabulous outbuilding with a built in bar and space for a snooker table. Outbuilding With Power & Light<br/><br/><b>Key Terms</b><br/>This Property is situated in well sought area of South Bexleyheath, in London borough of Zone 5. It is situated at junction between Bexley & Crayford. London commuters are blessed with 2 bus stops are just a stone through away. Bexley and Barnehurst railway station are just within a mile. A2 also is within few hundred yards. Property is walking distance to the borough’s largest shopping facility & supermarkets. There is short walk to a bowling alley, a cinema, Crook Log Leisure Centre, regular specialist markets and family-friendly restaurants too. Famous historic Hall-Place garden is also a very short walking distance.

Families are also attracted to Bexleyheath for the schooling – with two of the borough’s grammars and excellent primaries close by. The Red House – an Arts & Crafts property designed for the artist and socialist William Morris - is Bexleyheath’s premier cultural attraction.

detailedDescription:
Acorn are delighted to welcome to the market this well presented and spacious Semi Detached family home, offered to the market in no onward chain.

Set within this sought after Cul De Sac, the ground floor accommodation comprises entrance porch, WC, large front lounge, well appointed kitchen with integrated appliances, and an extended rear dining/entertaining area with double doors leading out onto the garden. The first floor comprises three well proportioned bedrooms and family bathroom.

Externally, the house offers off street parking, detached rear garage and a good size South Facing rear garden.

Local historical buildings of note are close by, with “Red House” by the national trust and co-designed in 1859 by the architect Philip Webb and the designer William Morris. The property is bright and airy throughout which gives a real good sense of space, the current accommodation on offer comprises of an entrance porch which then leads into the lounge, the dining room is to the middle of the home and is good size room giving plenty of space for a six seater table and chairs, from here you can then access the kitchen which also leads in to a lobby area then the ground floor WC.

To the first floor there are two large double bedrooms with the second room having a walk in wardrobe, the bathroom also to this floor and is a good size.

Externally there are front and rear gardens, with the rear having plenty room for those summer bbq's.

This is a great home which i'm sure will get a lot of interest.

Call anthony martin today to arrange your viewing!

Bexleyheath is a town within the heart of the London borough of Bexley. With great transport links, whether from the A2 or M25 main road, or via Bexleyheath Train Station, this is a very popular spot for the everyday commuters. A few key landmarks are scattered around the town, so if you have a keen eye for history, or pretty sights, the ‘Bexleyheath Clock Tower’ within The Broadway or ‘Danson Park’ could be your first stops.
As living in Bexleyheath goes, there isn’t many it can’t cater for with its large shopping mall with international retailers, several large supermarkets and a number of highly recommended restaurants and bars.
As a whole the Bexley borough is renowned for its wonderful array of schools, whether the family need primary or secondary education with many showing an outstanding 'Ofsted' report.

detailedDescription:
If you are in the market for a great-sized family home in a fantastic location then this lovely 4 bedroom detached home has to be top of your viewing list.

Nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac within very easy reach of Bexleyheath's Broadway, train station and highly regarded schools, you really couldn't wish for a better location. We are really impressed with the spacious accommodation on offer that is arranged across two floors and love that it has a lovely family bathroom on the ground floor and a modern shower room on the first floor too. The large lounge is complemented perfectly by the spacious conservatory to the rear of the home.

Outside, there is ample off-street parking via the driveway to the front and this is in addition to the incredible 'tandem' style garage measuring an impressive 29ft. The sunny rear garden has a wonderful decked area for alfresco dining in the warm summer evenings and a decent-sized lawn area also.

detailedDescription:
* video & 3D floorplan available *

This lovely Two Double Bedroom End of Terrace Family Home needs to be viewed to be fully appreciated.

Situated just a short walk to Abbey Wood Station (Crossrail) and with Lessness Woods directly accessible, this is an opportunity not to be missed!

Ready to move into, this property is offered in great condition and has been lovingly looked after by its current owners.

The ground floor accommodation offers you a bright airy living room with French doors leading into the large Kitchen/Diner. This room provides plenty of space and has the added benefit from patio doors leading onto the rear garden. There is also a utility room. There is a mature garden to the rear and a 20ft Garage with garden access. Upstairs you will find 2 double bedrooms and a fully tiled family bathroom with a shower.

With the often quoted "location, location, location" being so important, this property has so much to offer!

Situated in a quiet residential street and just a short walk to Abbey Wood Station, you would think this would be enough but you will also have instant access to glorious Lessness Woods from the rear of your property and have the stunning remains of an 11th Century Abbey with its surrounding parks and gardens as a neighbour.

There are several local bus routes as well as good local schools available and local shops and supermarkets within easy reach. The area will also benefit from the huge investment and regeneration of the Southmere Lake area.

Call now to arrange your viewing appointment.

Living room - 15'8" (4.78m) x 10'8" (3.25m)

Unique end of terrace double fronted four bedroom house situated under half a mile to Welling train station offered with no onward chain.

This family home features a double storey side extension. The accommodation now comprises a spacious L shaped through lounge/diner, kitchen, conservatory and separate cloakroom/w.c.

detailedDescription:
Beautifully presented extended four bedroom semi detached house situated in a popular road within walking distance to New Eltham and Sidcup train stations, Dulverton Primary School and Chislehurst and Sidcup Grammar School.

Having been finished to a very high specification the property offers fantastic space as a family home throughout.

The downstairs accommodation comprises of a lounge, a family room leading onto the stunning kitchen which has a range of integrated Neff appliances, under floor heating, Velux windows with rain sensors, raised extractor fan and bi-folding doors onto the rear garden. The kitchen leads through to a utility room, WC and a study/cinema room.

Upstairs there are four bedrooms, a family bathroom and an en suite to the master bedroom.

The rear garden features a decked area with a lined heated swimming pool which has a new pump and filter. There is a lawn area which has an outbuilding with electricity and WiFi which is currently being used as a gym.

The resin driveway has space for several cars.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented four bedroom Edwardian semi detached house, situated in The Hollies, just a few minutes walk to Sidcup train station.

The property has been modernised to the highest specification whilst still retaining its original character and charm.

The accommodation downstairs comprises a large lounge, kitchen/dining/family room, third reception room, utility room, study and cloakroom.

Integrated kitchen appliances include a Neff oven, Neff microwave and Fisher Paykel dishwasher.

To the first floor are four bedrooms with an ensuite bathroom to the master bedroom and family shower room.

Features include Banhams locks, alarm and CCTV system, Space Tidy understairs storage, a Vailant boiler, Space maker wardrobes in three of the bedrooms and Space maker cupboards in the study.

Outside to the front is off street parking for a number of vehicles with double gates leading to a double garage.

The rear garden has been landscaped and features patio areas and an artificial grass lawn.

Just a moments walk away is The Hollies Countryside Club; a private members club for residents of The Hollies only and featuring a swimming pool, tennis courts and a well equipped gymnasium.

A very reasonable annual charge is payable for this.

detailedDescription:
** chain free home **
** walking distance to bexley grammar school **

Anthony Martin are delighted to offer to the market this stunning detached family home which is located on a popular road on the south side of Welling, The property is perfectly located from everything a family will need, this includes, local shops, supermarkets, local schools, both primary, secondary and especially bexley grammar school, local transport including Welling Train Station and also danson park is only a short walk away making this a great all round home.

The property itself is quite a unique detached family home which has recently undergone a complete transformation by the current owners leaving no stone unturned.

The property is spacious throughout which starts as soon as you walk through the door, to the ground floor there are two huge areas which offer great open plan living for the lounge/kitchen/dining area, certainly making this the heart of the home, the lounge area has bi folding doors leading to the private garden area. Also to the ground floor on the other side of the home is a good size bedroom with an En suite bathroom.

To the first floor there are three further bedrooms and shower room.

Externally there is off road parking to the front as well as two private garden areas.

Call anthony martin today to arrange your viewing!

This fantastic 3 bed apartment has an open-plan living area which is filled with natural light and comes complete with a bespoke handleless fitted kitchen, integrated Bosch appliances and engineered wood flooring.

The Sidcup-By-Pass is just 0.7 miles away providing excellent links to the M20 and M25.

detailedDescription:
This property is a dream come true as it has been finished to a high standard and really does have a huge amount of internal space for all the family, especially the ground floor.

There is no need to worry about parking when you come home as this magnificent home has parking for the whole family.

With nice natural décor throughout it creates a warm, cosy homely feeling as you walk in the front door, and the downstairs luxury bathroom is just one example of the standard of specification this lovely home has been decorated to.

With a spacious living area and the under floor heating following through a majority of the downstairs, this home really is a must see!

There are 4 double bedrooms, with the possibility of changing the dining room into a 5th bedroom, and still having plenty of living space.

The garden to the rear can be an ideal place to spend the summer entertaining friends and family with the barbecue going and a nice glass of wine. There is also brick built outhouse, currently being used as a gym & workshop, which you could keep or transform into many other things.

If you are a commuter, the position cannot be any better with train stations close by and easy access to the A2, being in London cannot be made and easier.

Please refer to the footnote regarding the services and appliances.

What the Owner says:
We have fully renovated this house since we have lived here, including adding air conditioning to the conservatory, and tiling to the patio, making the conservatory a lovely place to relax.

We feel our home is suitable for any type of person/family that may want to live here and it would live up to your expectations.

We are pleased to be able to offer to the market this modern one bedroom, fifth floor apartment located in the ever popular "Fold" development. The Fold is situated just a short walk from Sidcup station as well as local shops and restaurants. The property benefits from a communal lift and with this property situated on the fifth floor it offers fantastic views of the surrounding area.

The property is accessed via a communal entrance with video entry system and communal lift to all floors. The apartment briefly comprises: Private entrance door, entrance hall with storage, main open plan living/kitchen area with fantastic floor to ceiling windows and kitchen area featuring composite stone worktops and high gloss white units. The master bedroom benefits from deep fitted wardrobes with glass sliding doors and the bathroom styled with Villeroy and Boch sanitaryware,

The floor to ceiling windows in the living room and bedroom offer fantastic views of the surrounding area and internal viewing comes highly recommended. The Fold also features a large roof top terrace with 360 degree views of the surrounding area and towards London's city centre.

We feel this is a great purchase for any commuter looking for a modern and stylish apartment and is offered chain Free.

detailedDescription:
**guide price £550,000 to £599,000**

Acorn are delighted to bring to the market this beautifully presented family home. Comprising a large and immaculate reception room leading to a stunning kitchen/diner with patio doors leading to a mature and well maintained garden with patio and lawned area.

Upstairs there is a generous sized landing with four light and airy double bedrooms leading off as well as a modern family sized bathroom.

Further benefits include off street parking to the front for two vehicles, downstairs W/C and shower room, double glazing throughout, Gas central heating and garage.

Transport links are plentiful with bus routes to surrounding areas including Bexleyheath, North Greenwich (The O2), Bluewater and Abbey Wood with the up and coming Crossrail Network. Albany Park & Sidcup Station offers direct links to London Bridge, Charing Cross, Cannon Street, Waterloo East & Victoria. Changes are possible at Lewisham for the DLR and New Cross for the East London Line. Crook Log Leisure Centre & The Broadway Shopping Centre are also within reasonable distance.

There are also many sought after primary & secondary schools nearby including Bexley Grammar School – Ofsted rated (Outstanding), Townley Grammar, Blackfen School for Girls, Hurstmere School & Chislehurst and Sidcup Grammar.

*the last chance* - Reserve a 1 bed this June to receive up to £5k worth of tailor made incentives - Subject to terms and conditions.

Last few remaining!

Plot 225 – The Anson design, a stunning 546 sqft, second floor 1 bedroom apartment with 29 ft kitchen/living area, private balcony and allocated parking!

A wonderful collection of 1 and 2 bedroom apartments set in a great commuter location serving London Bridge in under 35 minutes!

All apartments have been thoughtfully designed to offer flexible living with the spacious accommodation. Comprising contemporary kitchens, spacious living areas, master bedrooms with en-suites, sumptuous family bathrooms, separate laundry cupboards (to selected plots), balconies plus allocated parking. These apartments also benefit from lift access, audio entry phone system, Fibre Optic high-speed internet connection plus much, much more.

What’s more Egerton Place offers an excellent opportunity to purchase your first home with the 40% Help to Buy scheme and only a 5% deposit.

Within walking distance is a fast train service from Slade Green/Erith train stations which provide fast and frequent services to London Bridge from approximately 35 minutes.

Bluewater shopping centre is approximately a 10 minute drive as is a number of good local schools nearby. Erith ticks more boxes then you may expect. For drivers the M25 is minutes away, London City Airport 16 miles away, Gatwick Airport 38 miles and City of London 18 miles.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
***** guide price £500,000 - £525,000 *****

Situated in a popular residential road is this extended chain free four bedroom semi detached home. Needing a light modernisation programme for all those keen on adding their own stamp to a home, this is a perfect property to get stuck into and enjoy the space this property has to offer. Bexleyheath shopping centre is close by offering all of your everyday essentials including transport links and perfect bus routes to and from town.

The ground floor accommodation offers a vast amount of space for those looking for that next step home on the ladder. A sitting room diner is at the front of the home, an enjoyable space to sit around the table with friends and family of an evening. This room could be also be used as the main reception room dependant of your own requirements. To the rear of the property offering a picturesque outlook onto the garden is the lounge area. This room is flooded with natural light.

The kitchen offers potential to offer an open plan design within. With relevant consents being in place this kitchen could be knocked through into the reception area offering a modern kitchen space for those keen chefs in the family.

The first floor offers four spacious bedrooms, a family bathroom and an additional shower room.

Outside the garden is mainly laid to lawn with a small formal patio area to kick back and relax in the sun.

Off street parking as well as a garage can be found to the front of this home.

detailedDescription:
*** Guide Price £250,000 - £260,000 ***
Your Move are excited to present this stunning two bedroom property. It is walking distance from the ever-popular Nuxley Village and offers a spacious yet cosy living environment. The property is cleverly designed with ample storage throughout the hallway, and the master bedroom follows in suit, coming equipped with a large fitted wardrobe. It is also an excellent size capable of fitting a double bed and multiple luxuries. The second bedroom is a good size, whilst narrower than the master, it is still more than capable of holding the essentials, and it is also complete with a fitted double wardrobe. The rest of the property is made up of a modern bathroom and a kitchen which has been recently fitted. The stunning lounge has a huge window towards the back of the room allowing a vast amount of light to enter which, as well as the property being south facing, gives you the opportunity to maximize on the summer weather! Finally, the property comes with a private garage en block allowing for parking or extra storage if needed.

Location

Close to local amenities and perfect for transport links into London and Bexleyheath. Nuxley village is close giving fantastic access to to pubs, restaurants and shops.

Our View

The property is ideal location, with excellent transport links and close to local amenities. The property is suited for practically anyone whether that be a first time buyer, or young family. Don't miss out on this superb property, book a viewing today.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This a beautiful and large semi-detached family home on the popular Blendon Road.

As you arrive you will notice that large driveway which fits multiple cars and the large side access to the rear garden.

At the front is a porch area which has a solid wooden door and stain glass windows. As you go through into the house you will be met with a welcoming entrance hall. To the right is a large living area which has ample space for a large family. This room has large windows which allow plenty of light and a feature fireplace.

Towards the back of the home is a separate kitchen which has lots of storage and counter space and a separate dining area. The dining area is neatly decorated and makes a great place to entertain guests. The stunning dining room has French doors which overlook the large rear south facing garden.

The large south facing rear garden has a large garage with a pit and side access which takes you to the front.

Upstairs are two large double bedrooms, one single room a bathroom with a shower and a separate lavatory.

There are lots of good primary and secondary schools in the area including Hurst Primary School, Bexley Grammar, beths Boys Grammar School, Townley Girls Grammar.

This property is close to some great amenities with a Coop and takeaway services just a short stroll away. Danson Park is a popular park which is under a mile to walk.

Transport links into the city are great, it is a 1.1 mile walk to Bexley or Albany Park train station and regular trains in London Bridge in under 30 minutes. The A2 is within touch distance and just half a mile away.

Call Joshua Smith today for more information and to arrange a viewing!

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

address: Sydney Court, Lansdown Road, Sidcup DA14
detailedDescription:
A two bedroom retirement apartment on the first floor with balcony overlooking the park and close to lifts

Summary

Sydney Court is a Retirement Living Plus development built by McCarthy & Stone, designed specifically for the over 70s, for those who wish to enjoy independent living but may need some extra care and support. There is an Estate Manager who leads the team and oversees the development. This apartment features Oak veneered doors throughtout, a fully fitted kitchen with neff appliances, underfloor heating, fitted and tiled shower room with level access shower and a 24 hour emergency call system.

Communal facilities include a homeowners lounge where social events and activities take place, a function room and a landscaped courtyard. There is a fully equipped laundry room and bistro-style restaurant that serves freshly prepared meals daily. If your guests wish to stay, there is guest suite accommodation which can be booked (fees apply). There are lifts to all levels in the building, mobility scooter store and wellbeing suite. There is a 24 hour emergency call system provided by a personal pendant and call points in your bedroom and bathroom as well as onsite management 24 hours a day.

One hour of domestic support per week is included in the service charge at Sydney Court with additional services including care and support available at an extra charge. However, this can be from as little as 15 minutes per session which can be increased or decreased to suit your needs.

Sydney Court backs on to Waring Park with beautiful views. There is an Arts and Adult Education Centre at the end of the road. The main Station Road, with restaurants and shops, is nearby, and Sidcup railway station is less than ½ a mile away. You can catch direct trains to London Charing Cross and Cannon Street, as well as Lewisham and Woolwich there is also a good local bus service.

Entrance Hall

Front door with spy hole leads to the large entrance hall - the 24-hour Tunstall emergency response pull cord system is situated in the hall. From the hallway there is a door to a walk-in storage cupboard/airing cupboard. Illuminated light switches, smoke detector, apartment security door entry system with intercom and emergency pull cord located in the hall. Doors lead to the bedrooms, lounge, cloakroom and shower room.

Lounge With Balcony

A well-proportioned lounge with double glazed patio door and window to side opening onto balcony with views of communal gardens and the park beyond. Feature fireplace, TV and telephone points, Sky/Sky+ connection point. Two ceiling lights. Fitted carpets, raised electric power sockets. Partially glazed door lead onto a separate kitchen.

Kitchen

Modern fitted kitchen with a range of low and eye level units and drawers with a roll top work surface. UPVC double glazed electronically operated window overlooking communal gardens and park beyond. Stainless steel sink with mono lever tap and drainer. Neff oven, neff microwave oven, ceramic hob, splashback, cooker hood and integral fridge freezer, tiled floor and under pelmet lighting.

Bedroom One

Double bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe housing rails and shelving. Ceiling lights, TV and phone point. Window overlooking gardens and park.

Bedroom Two

Good size double bedroom, Ceiling lights, TV and phone point, window overlooking gardens and park.

Shower Room

Tiled shower room with walk-in level access shower. Underfloor heating and grab rails. WC and Vanity unit with sink mirror, heated towel rail, and shaver socket. Emergency pull cord.

Separate Wc

Partly tiled walls, WC, pedestal wash hand basin, mirror, tiled floor.

Service Charges

• Cleaning of communal windows
• Water rates for communal areas and apartments
• Electricity, heating, lighting and power to communal areas
• 24-hour emergency call system
• Upkeep of gardens and grounds
• Repairs and maintenance to the interior and exterior communal areas
• Contingency fund including internal and external redecoration of communal areas
• Buildings insurance
The service charge does not cover external costs such as your Council Tax, electricity or TV, but does include the cost of your Estates Manager, your water rates, the 24-hour emergency call system, the heating and maintenance of all communal areas, exterior property maintenance and gardening. To find out more about service charges please contact your Property Consultant or Estates Manager.

Leasehold

Lease 999 Years from 2017

detailedDescription:

Check out the new video tour.....If you want to live the dream then this is the property for you, drenched with luxury and bursting at the seams with high end gadgets this house is truly special.
The heart of the house is the cooks kitchen where gordon ramsay would not look out of place, featuring a bespoke island with multiple cooking options including siemens induction, teppanyaki station and indoor BBQ grill together with 3 siemens smart ovens conventional, steam and combination, complimented by a host of storage solutions and finished with ice white corian surfaces.
The rest of the accommodation includes 2 bathrooms both with a high end finish, 3 bedrooms with the main bedroom having a walk in dresser and a lounge with zonal lighting and focal point remote controlled gas fire.
The entire ground floor has porcelain tiled flooring with water under floor heating and the entire house has nest smart smoke alarms.
Music is available on demand thanks to sonos system with an octuplet of speakers, the division between the ground and first floor is breath taking with a bespoke grey oak staircase which has remote controlled illumination and leads to a landing with vaulted ceiling and dual remote controlled skylights.
The outside includes a driveway to the front with parking for 3 cars and the rear garden has a tiki bar style BBQ area and large air conditioned summer house.
The location is great being just a short stroll from a great local supermarket and an eclectic selection of eateries.

detailedDescription:
Take a look at this stunning, extended family home situated in this ideal location. This home comprises to the ground floor a generous entrance hall giving access to the front lounge, beautiful open plan living space with lounge area, dining area and large kitchen with plenty of storage space, sky lights and double doors leading into the rear garden. You also have a utility room and downstairs shower room and access to the garage too. To the first floor you have five bedrooms which are all great sizes and family bathroom too with both bath and shower units. Externally this home offers off street parking to the front and a large rear garden with summerhouse too! This home really does offer everything you could possibly need so be sure to book your viewing before its gone!

Longmead Drive in Sidcup is the location for this five bedroom extended semi detached house. Living here you are perfectly positioned for everything you could possibly need.

Starting with public transport links, you are blessed here with multiple options for all forms of transport. You have a wide choice of bus routes on offer here, providing access to all the surrounding towns. Albany Park train station is a short walk away, getting you into London or further out to Kent which ever way is your need for work or leisure. The A2 & M20 motorway links are not far from here. If you need to drive to work you can find yourself in London within minutes, or you could take yourself out to the Kent coast as well.

If you have children, then schooling will be an important element for your property search. Living here you have a fantastic selection of schools ranging from Nurseries all the way up to Secondary schools. Some of the Bexley Boroughs finest schools are in the area with Chislehurst & Sidcup Grammar School, Cleeve Park School & Hurstmere School for Boys all in a short walking distance.

title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
This is a fantastic opportunity to buy the perfect family home in the ideal location. Set in the heart of Bexleyheath, is this 3/4 bedroom family home with room for all the family and a stones throw from everything you could need.

The property comes with a large front driveway with space for multiple vehicles. Once inside you are greeted with a property that has been beautifully decorated and very well looked after by its current owners.

The ground floor comes with fantastic reception space, a lovely size kitchen and the 4th bedroom or home office/study. The lounge and dining room is 23ft long that also opens up into the conservatory that over looks the garden. The large kitchen comes with ample surface space to prepare the evening meal, space for integrated white goods and lots of storage cupboards for all your food and utensils.

Up on the first floor is where you will find the three remaining bedrooms and family bathroom. Two of the bedrooms are double size rooms with the main bedroom, located to the front, coming with a large bay window. The second bedroom comes with views of the rear garden. The family bathroom offers bath with over shower, w.c and wash basin.

The rear garden is a perfect space for any family. With a combination of lawn and patio areas, you will be able to hold the family parties and BBQs in the summer.

Location

Highland Road is the location for this three/four bedroom semi detached house. The property itself could not be better positioned as everything a family will need is literally on its doorstep, this includes Bexleyheath Broadway which has almost every shop you would want plus a range of bars and restaurants, the property is also close to a range of schools including primary, secondary and grammar schools plus has great access for the A2/M25 links if needed.

The local area offers plenty to do with Bexleyheath's Broadway Shopping Centre and further local amenities – including the doctor’s surgery, cinema, library, post office, M&S, Sainsbury etc all within a very short walk. The property is located very close to outstanding schools including Townley Grammar and Beths.

The property is located within a quiet residential area on Bexleyheath’s sought after south side offering excellent transport links to the nearby Bexleyheath Station, local bus services (including to North Greenwich and to the new coming Elizabeth tube line) and local access to the A2.

Offers in the region of £600,000 will be considered for this 1930 's built 4 Bedroom Semi Detached Family home that is located in a popular residential road in Bexleyheath.

Step inside the property to find Ground Floor accommodation comprising of Entrance Hall, Lovely Shower Room, Bedroom 4, Good Size Lounge, Fitted Kitchen and a Dining Room which in turn opens onto the Rear Garden. Moving upstairs you will find a Huge Landing, 3 well-proportioned Bedrooms & and the Lovely main Family Bathroom.

The property also benefits from Double Glazing, Gas Central Heating, approximate 65 Foot Rear Garden with side access, Garage plus Off-Street Parking for several cars to the front and side.

Not only does this property offer you really good size living accommodation but it is also within walking distance of Local Shops, Schools (Bursted Woods & Belmont to name 2 ), Bus Routes plus Bexleyheath ( zone 5) and Barnehurst ( zone 6 ) Train stations are both close by as is the A2 and M25 Motorways.

All in all, this property will make an Ideal Family home, please call us if you have any questions or you would like to book a viewing.

title: 2 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
Old Farm Place, Sidcup

Sales Suite and Show Homes now launched - Contact us today to book your exclusive appointment

An impressive four bedroom detached house, providing a kitchen/dining area, separate living room, study and utility room on the ground floor. Upstairs there are four bedrooms; the master bedroom complete with an en-suite, together with three further bedrooms and a family bathroom.

Old Farm Place offers an outstanding collection of new, traditional style apartments and houses, adjacent to a beautiful park. The new homes are set in a delightful street scene all with ample parking and offering stylish living close to local amenities, with excellent connections to central London, the glorious Kent countryside and beautiful coast.

Priority to be given to people who live / work locally to the development.

Address: Old Farm Place, DA15 8FD (Off Old Farm Avenue, in Sidcup)

The Homes

With its architectural detailing taking inspiration from a modern interpretation of houses in the local area, the development at Old Farm Place offers a range of homes to appeal to families, first-time buyers, downsizers and commuters. All apartments have allocated parking, while the development itself is adjacent to the newly landscaped Old Farm Park.

Local Area

With excellent local schools and a bustling High Street and nearby Station Road, Sidcup is remarkably well-served with traditional butchers to modern coffee shops and a choice of supermarkets. Spend an evening in a micropub, discover an award winning curry chef or attend a performance at Rose Bruford College. Sidcup Leisure Centre is a hub of health and fitness activities, while nearby Foots Cray Meadows, Hall Place and Danson Park are the perfect locations for a day out.

Transport

With Sidcup Station less than a mile from Old Farm Place, offering direct services into London Bridge, Charing Cross and Cannon Street, this makes it the perfect location for commuting.

Sidcup is also well-served by several major roads, including the A2, A20/M20 and M25 making it ideal for popping to Bluewater, enjoying a day out in Whitstable or traveling further via one of London's airports.

Journey times are taken from and are approximate only. Distances are taken from and are approximate only.

Through the Home for Life Plan from Homewise, those aged 60 or over can purchase a Lifetime Lease with a one-off payment to become the Lifetime Lease owner of this property. The cost to purchase the Lifetime Lease is always less than the full market value. The saving can vary from 8.5% to 59%* depending on your age, personal circumstances and property criteria. The above guide price is the estimated price payable by a 69-year-old single male. For an indication of what you could save, please use our calculator on the Homewise website (see link below). detailedDescription:
*** Chain Free ***

Purplebricks are delighted to bring to the market this spacious, and well presented flat in this popular development, with a private terrace and garage.

Offered to the market with a share of the Freehold, the benefit of a new lease and from being in no onward chain, the flat comprises two large double bedrooms, bathroom and a large open plan kitchen lounge area, with fitted kitchen units, integrated appliances and ample storage. Externally, the flat boasts a large private terrace off of the lounge, with views over the adjacent sports fields, and further boasts a Garage En Bloc.

Sharnbrooke Close is a stone throw away from Welling and Bexleyheath Stations (0.7miles) offering frequent access into the City. The shops and restaurants of both Welling and Bexleyheath are also within walking distance.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Offered to the market chain free, this superb semi detached period home is located in the heart of Sidcup.

Set over three floors, the house is currently set up as a HMO, offers tremendous space throughout and investment potential. On the ground floor there are two spacious reception rooms, a fantastic dining room which leads on to a large kitchen. Upstairs there are five good sized bedrooms, one of which on the top floor has an en suite and two bathrooms.

The property includes benefits such as a good sized private rear garden, period features throughout and off street parking to the front for up to four cars.

Offering an enviable location, the property is situated just a short walk away from the fantastic amenities of Sidcup High Street such as supermarkets, restaurants, bars and coffee shops. Sidcup Station is just a stones throw away, providing fast and regular services to Central London.

Contact Kallars to arrange a viewing today.

address: Jefferies Lodge, 48-60 Footscray Road, London SE9
detailedDescription:
*** retirement apartment ***
Plot 30 is a one bedroom apartment on the second floor.
This beautiful apartment comes with a fully fitted kitchen, spacious living room, separate shower room and a large bedroom.

The kitchen has been designed for practicality, with a fitted fridge, freezer and a waist-height oven to save bending down. There’s also an integral washer/dryer fitted. The bedroom comes complete with fitted wardrobes as well as TV and telephone points, with even the smallest details considered.

About the Development

This stunning retirement development of one and two bedroom apartments is in a fantastic, central location, close to all the essential amenities and public transport. Jefferies Lodge is home to 38 apartments and includes an Owners' Lounge with a built-in coffee bar, creating the perfect location for socialising with like-minded neighbours. The development is within easy reach of the local shops, supermarkets and tourist attractions, so you can enjoy an independent, active retirement.

Social and communal lifestyle

Communal gardens are carefully landscaped, giving you the perfect place to relax and enjoy an afternoon cup of tea, without having to worry about the maintenance and upkeep that a large garden so often demands. The carefully designed Owners’ Lounge comes complete with a coffee bar and is a popular feature, providing the perfect venue for entertaining, participating in activities organised by your Lodge Manager, or just relaxing with a book. Events include everything from fish and chip suppers, to tea dances, giving you the chance to socialise as much as you like throughout the year.

The fully furnished Guest Suite provides an ideal space for your family and friends to stay over when visiting, while a lift to all floors is installed for your convenience.

Safety and security

This apartment comes complete with a 24 hour emergency Careline system, while a camera entry system is installed as standard, so you can feel safe and secure in your retirement. Intruder alarms and fire alarm systems are fitted throughout the Lodge, while a Lodge Manager is on hand to assist you with anything else you might need. EPC Grade B. Please note that all particulars and images are for marketing and illustrative purposes only. Advertising images may include upgrades as home specifications can vary.

All measurements have been taken as a guide to prospective buyers only, and are not precise. Please be advised that some of the particulars may be awaiting vendor approval. title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A chain free three bedroom detached period property.

New to the market is this detached house on a wonderful residential road in Sidcup. This property has great kerb appeal with original London stock brick and traditional bay window.

The ground floor comprises a front reception room with high ceiling, the second separate reception room is ideal for dining room with exposed brick chimney breast. A modern kitchen which has the potential to extend and also leads into the private garden which is a space to enjoy without being overlooked. A well-proportioned family bathroom and upstairs are three double bedrooms all naturally light and loft space which could be converted (STPP).

This house has the benefit of off street parking and is offered chain free.

Located just 0.4 miles walk from Sidcup Station with excellent services into London Bridge, Charing Cross and Cannon Street. Sidcup High Street offers an array of shops, bars and restaurants.
