detailedDescription:
*****modern one double bedroom self contained annexe*****
Located on a sought after road, backing onto the playing fields of Hurstmere Secondary school and Chislehurst & Sidcup Grammar School, is this fantastic extended four double bedroom semi-detached chalet style family home with the additional benefit of a one double bedroom annex.
The property is closely situated for Sidcup mainline station, bus routes and is in the catchment for several sought after schools.
This spacious family home comprises spacious entrance hall, downstairs w.c., open plan double bay fronted living, dining room, extended fully fitted country style Wren kitchen/breakfasting room with doors leading to a decked seating area overlooking the rear garden. Upstairs are four double bedrooms, laundry room and stylish family bathroom.
The property has been extended with the garage converted into a modern one double bedroom self-contained annexe which boasts double bedroom, shower/utility room, spacious hallway, French doors leading from the kitchen & living to the decking area and garden.
Additional benefits include double glazing, gas central heating, off street - driveway parking for 3-4 cars and is offered with no onward chain.
Call or email immediately in order to book your viewing

title: 3 bed detached bungalow for sale

detailedDescription:
Wonderful opportunity to purchase this Chain Free 3 Bed Semi detached Family house that is in need of updating, the property was built in 1966 and is located in a popular cul de sac in the much sought-after Park Crescent area.

Step inside to find accommodation comprising of a Good size Entrance Hall, Kitchen and an 18 x 12 Foot Lounge / Diner which in turn opens onto the Rear Garden. Moving upstairs to the spacious landing you will find a Bathroom, 3 Good sized bedrooms with Bedroom 1 is an impressive 18 x 12 Foot and Bedroom 3 10 x 7 ‘ 6 Foot.

Although the property is in need of refurbishment it does have Double Glazing, Gas Central Heating, 40 Foot Rear Garden with side access, 17 Foot Garage plus own driveway.

All local amenities including Shops, Schools, Hospital, Bus Routes and Erith Train Station ( zone 6 ) are within walking distance as well. From Erith Train Station you can get into the London Stations in approximately 35 - 40 minutes plus you are on the same line / 2 stops from abbey wood which will have the much-anticipated Crossrail running from it in the not-too-distant future.

Properties in this cul de sac rarely become available so with this in mind we recommend you call us to arrange your viewing of this ideal Family home.

A spacious three double bedroom end of terrace property situated on a sought after road within easy reach of Sidcup High Street, popular local schools, transport links and amenities.

The ground floor accommodation comprises of a bright and airy reception room with double doors which lead to the rear garden, a separate dining room with built in storage taking you into a decent size kitchen. The rear garden is low maintenance and extends to the side of the house to form a corner garden plot.

The first floor provides three large double bedrooms all of which are naturally light. The master bedroom benefits from built in storage and ensuite shower room. There is also a large family three piece bathroom suite with shower over bath.

Located just 1.0 miles walk from Sidcup Station offering excellent services into London Bridge, Charing Cross and Cannon Street. Sidcup High Street is also nearby. Longlands Primary, Dulverton Primary, Cleeve Park Secondary and Chislehurst & Sidcup Grammar schools are all within proximity.

detailedDescription:
Immaculate 5 Bedroom Semi Detached Property, situated in a the highly sought after Pantiles area of Bexleyheath, within walking distance of local shops, schools and Bexleyheath Train Station (Zone 5). In our opinion this property would make an ideal family home

Step Inside the property to find a light an airy spacious hall way which leads onto a through lounge/diner with french doors opening out onto the conservatory ideal for those summer days.

The owners have also recently installed a stunning L shape kitchen in a high gloss finish with patio doors out onto a mature established well maintained 80 ft garden, laid to lawn with patio and decked areas and also established pond. To the rear of the garden is also a handy summer house.

Also to the ground floor is a 13'x7' Bedroom with it's own en suite toilet and hand basin, ideal for guests, older children or those with mobility issues.

Moving upstairs are three further double bedrooms, two of which have built in storage and also a single bedroom.

A handy shower room and also a good size modern bathroom, no more arguing over who's using the bathroom next in the morning!

The property further benefits from New Internal Doors, Double Glazing, Gas Central Heating (untested) and has off street parking for 3 cars.

Having lived in the property for a number of years the vendors really have thought about what the needs are of the modern family. Within walking distance of the Pantiles with it's shops, restaurants and public house it is also within easy walk of Belmont Primary school and just 20 minute walk to Bexleyheath Train station which will get you into Central London within 35 minutes.

detailedDescription:
Earn instant income on this already tenanted investment opportunity - not suitable for owner occupiers! This excellent three bedroom mid terrace is located 12 minutes from Dartford town centre, enquire today to avoid disappointment.

This wonderful three bedroom mid terrace comprises of; entrance hallway leading to a spacious lounge with double glazed window to the front; fully fitted kitchen with all appliances included; separate dining area; staircase leading to three spacious double bedrooms with double glazed windows; three piece family bathroom with shower over bath. The property comes with on street parking, and has a rear yard.

With Oak Road being just minutes from Dartford town centre, it couldn't be a better time to invest. A new £75m cultural quarter has been lauded as a "key milestone" after being approved by councillors. The Westgate development scheme will see the derelict area between Spital Street and Hythe Street given a new lease of life as part of plans to attract more visitors to Dartford town centre. With work on the project already underway, Dartford council aims to build 120 new homes, of which 20 have been designated as affordable housing in the form of shared ownership units.

There is also a multi-screen cinema, health and wellbeing centre and nine new retail units consisting of restaurants and bars, which will all form part of the regeneration to create a new "cultural quarter", linked with the existing train station and facilities. With house prices in DA8 having already risen by 1.13% over the past 12 months, now is the perfect time to invest for the long term.

detailedDescription:
Acorn are pleased to present to the market this stunning four bedroom Victorian home. The property boasts a classy feel throughout and is finished to the highest quality along with original Victorian features enhanced by modern interior design.

The ground floor boasts an entrance hall, beautiful reception room with beautiful bay window and original fireplace and a bright and airy kitchen/diner with French doors to the rear.

Whereas the first floor comprises the master bedroom, three further well-proportioned bedrooms and three piece bathroom suite.

Externally the property benefits from off street parking and to the rear a well presented garden with decking area followed by a well maintained garden. Further benefits to note include a spacious cellar to the lower ground floor, gas central heating and partly double glazed.

Call us now to view this amazing home before its gone! Energy Efficiency Rating E.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Guide price £750,000 - £800,000. Outstandingly well finished & extended four bedroom, two bathroom period home for sale in Sidcup. Featuring contemporary decor & a fantastic kitchen diner, with bi-fold doors, that looks on to a superb garden which has the benefit of artificial grass, a bonded resin patio, a decked area & a built in BBQ.

The property is walking distance to both Sidcup and New Eltham train stations.

Attention to detail was paid to the property when refurbishment works were carried out and no expense spared. The kitchen features a solid worktop and a large freestanding double oven and 5 ring burner hob. The master bedroom features an open en-suite area and a freestanding bath. Large sash windows are fitted to the rear of the property and the brickwork has been re-pointed ensuring that the character the property was built with is maintained after the extension.

Offered for sale is this truly stunning 2 bedroom bungalow. This beautiful property is ready for any buyer to simply move straight into with everything even down to the finer details all presented to such a high standard. It will appeal to a wide audience such as commuters, small families but in particular those who are downsizing. This is a rare chance to purchase a modern bungalow that certainly offers a 'wow' factor and makes it stand out from other bungalows in the area.

The property briefly comprises of: A secure gated entrance, a pathway with flower beds and lighting, entrance door, entrance hall with storage, it then flows nicely into a large open plan living area. This is a spectacular room which shows off its fantastic ceiling height and modern layout. It offers so much natural light with doors to the garden and a large floor to ceiling window which makes a real statement for the room. The living room Is open plan to the kitchen which is again in great condition with a range of appliances and storage. There are 2 bedrooms with the property and an immaculate family shower room. Externally there is parking to the front and an easy maintenance rear garden with artificial lawn and decking area.

The property sits in a desirable location that offers easy access to local shops, restaurants and transport links and will appeal to a wide range of buyers due to this and its standout condition.

detailedDescription:
This semi-detached chalet home is new to the market with lots of potential and the option to extend (STPP).

The house currently offers a welcoming entrance hall leading in to front reception, a rear dining room taking you in to a spacious kitchen with so much scope to open up and make a great family space to enjoy. There is also has a family size bathroom with WC and third bedroom.

The first floor has two large double bedrooms both naturally light and the house has a homely feel throughout. Externally there is a decent size front drive with room for several cars and a beautiful private garden with only tree’s in sight. This property will make a fantastic home for a family looking to settle in a nice area close to everything you require.

Located within just 0.5 mile to Sidcup High Street and approximately 1 mile to Sidcup Train Station making this property ideal for commuters or those wanting the convenience of the local amenities Sidcup has to offer.

Internally the property has been well maintained and modernised by the vendor and comprises a 13ft lounge area, two well proportioned bedrooms, a new fitted kitchen which has all of the integrated appliances and a modern bathroom.

Externally there is a well tended rear garden and if you have a car there is a garage en-bloc.

The property is situated on a quiet road close to local shops and Foots Cray Meadows which is an ideal place to walk your dog, or if you love to run, this would be a fantastic place to do this.

Bexley Village, Ruxley and Sidcup are all nearby which is a huge bonus and you really need to view this property for it to be fully appreciated, so book your viewing slot now!

detailedDescription:
Set on a charming road in Sidcup this period terrace home with potential to extend STPP is not one to be missed. This characterful, three bedroom two reception room home has been lovingly maintained by the current owners, also offering an exciting opportunity to add your own touch to a property and make your own!

Upon entering you are immediately drawn to the open through reception rooms offering genuine flexibility of use. The kitchen boasts a traditional look flooded with natural sunlight and direct access to a well-tended garden with rear access!

Upstairs benefits from three generously sized double bedrooms, the main bedroom measuring up at an impressive 15ft x 12ft. In keeping with the age of the property you will find the family bathroom located on the ground floor. The private garden is easy to maintain and lets in an abundance of light. This will make a fantastic home to enjoy as the previous owners have for many years.

Bedford Road sits just 0.8 of a mile to Sidcup station and is under a mile to the bustling high street for all your local amenities as well as a wide range of café’s and eateries.

detailedDescription:
New instruction £ guided £310,000 to 325,000 Large 2 bed favoured ground floor with South facing front garden with communal parking in the heart of beautiful Bexley Village and in close proximity to the mainline station and shops and restaurants.

This flat is in excellent condition with a well sized lounge leading to its front south facing garden. The lounge leads to a well specified kitchen. The first bedroom is a large double with a slightly smaller second and well specified bathroom.

Ascot Court is a small exclusive development comprising of 36 properties arranged over 4 floors, with lift access. The secure block has a door entry system and 24-hour emergency call system.

The leasehold has 66 years remaining and was granted on the 25th of December 1988. Applicants must be over 60 years of age to qualify.

Residents of the development have the use of a furnished drawing room where various weekly activities take place. There are also attractive landscaped gardens, with well-stocked flowerbeds and a number of paved areas for sitting and enjoying the surroundings. The popular retirement development is located close to the centre of Bexley Village with a doctors and dentists surgery, coffee shops and a variety of restaurants. Bexleyheath town centre is also easily accessible with a bus stop very close by.

We urge early viewings through Harpers & Co on .

detailedDescription:
3 bedroom duplex available at Alderton Court for £109,375!
Register now to book a viewing

Alderton Court - Apartment 001
3-bedroom ground floor duplex offering 114 sq.m of internal floor area with outdoor space. Contact a member of our sales team now to view our new show home.£109,375 for a 25% share of £437,500 and a deposit as low as £10,938 and a minimum income of £55,000.

What is shared ownership?
Under the shared ownership scheme you part-own and part-rent your home, making it
possible for first-time buyers and families to get on the property ladder. The minimum
share you can purchase is 25% and the maximum is 75%. You will usually pay a mortgage on the part you own and a subsidised rent on
the part you don't own. Over time, you can increase the share you own until you eventually own 100%

L&Q at Eastside Quarter
Situated near Bexleyheath Town Centre, L&Q at Eastside Quarter is a brand-new collection of 1,2 and 3-bedroom homes exclusively available through Shared Ownership with L&Q. The development will offer a collection of thoughtfully designed apartments throughout several phases, providing a total of 36 Shared Ownership homes to this thriving new community. Designed to provide the best in urban living with modern interiors, all homes within L&Q at Eastside Quarter will be finished to a great specification throughout with integrated appliances, contemporary new kitchens, bathrooms and quality flooring making it the perfect place to call home.

Bexley Connections
L&Q at Eastside Quarter also provides ample opportunity for all its residents to be entertained. For instance, there are plenty of local amenities, including Broadway Shopping Centre, a multiplex cinema, a superstore and a variety of bars, cafés and restaurants located just a couple of minutes’ walk away from your new home. In addition to Bexleyheath’s fantastic selection of amenities, Eastside Quarter’s travel convenient connections make it easy to travel further afield in search of even wider choice. For example, residents can reach Bluewater, one of the UK’s largest shopping centre, in less than 15 minutes by car. Residents can also reach Central London in little as 27 minutes when travelling from Bexleyheath station.

Viewings
For those who would like to and are able to visit us, the Show Home is now open on an appointment-only basis, with extra measures in place to ensure your wellbeing. Please call us to book your appointment. If you would prefer to speak to our Sales Team from your own home, they are still on hand and can conduct appointments via phone, email and by virtual tour. *We are taking extra precautions to ensure the health and wellbeing of our customers, staff and members of the public.

detailedDescription:
Well presented 1 Double Bedroom Ground Floor Front line apartment that has the most Stunning views over the River Thames and surrounding area.

Once you are past the Security Entry Phone System you will a well-kept communal hallway that leads to your Apartment. Step inside and you will find an Entrance Hall, Bathroom, 1 Double Bedroom, Fitted Kitchen and a 21 ' Lounge / Diner with Juliet Balcony. Nb You have Full River Views from the Lounge / Diner and Bedroom.

Some benefits worth noting are double glazing, gas central heating (untested), entry phone system and secured allocated parking space plus a Visitors space.

The location of the property is also really good as you are close to local amenities including Bus Routes, Bexley College, Morrison's Supermarket & The Riverside Shopping Centre plus Erith Train Station ( zone 6 ) is a 5 minute walk away and will get you into the London Stations (Cannon Street / Charing Cross) in approximately 35 - 40 minutes, and is also on the same line and only 2 stops from Abbey Wood Station which will have Crossrail running from it in the not too distant future.

In terms of running costs the seller has advised us that there is a £1973.71 per annum service charge which includes your Building Insurance, you also pay an additional £197.37 per annum fee for the upkeep of the Thames Walkway. Once you own the property you also own a share of the Freehold with a lease of approximately 133 years.

If you have any questions about this lovely property or you would like to book a viewing then please feel free to call us and we will be happy to help you.

detailedDescription:
An ideal first time purchase or investment opportunity. Located close to local amenities and main line train station this property offers a fantastic start on the property ladder. EPC Grade C.

This property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction. Should you view, offer or bid on the property, your information will be shared with the Auctioneer, iamsold.

This method of auction requires both parties to complete the transaction within 56 days of the draft contract for sale being received by the buyers solicitor. This additional time allows buyers to proceed with mortgage finance (subject to lending criteria, affordability and survey).

The buyer is required to sign a reservation agreement and make payment of a non-refundable Reservation Fee. This being 3% of the purchase price including VAT, subject to a minimum of £6,000.00 including VAT. The Reservation Fee is paid in addition to purchase price and will be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property in the calculation for stamp duty liability.

Buyers will be required to go through an identification verification process with iamsold and provide proof of how the purchase would be funded.

This property has a Buyer Information Pack which is a collection of documents in relation to the property. The documents may not tell you everything you need to know about the property, so you are required to complete your own due diligence before bidding. A sample copy of the Reservation Agreement and terms and conditions are also contained within this pack.

The buyer will also make payment of £300.00 including VAT towards the preparation cost of the pack, where it has been provided by iamsold.

The property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price with both the Reserve Price and Starting Bid being subject to change.

Referral Arrangements

The Partner Agent and Auctioneer may recommend the services of third parties to you. Whilst these services are recommended as it is believed they will be of benefit; you are under no obligation to use any of these services and you should always consider your options before services are accepted.

Where services are accepted the Auctioneer or Partner Agent may receive payment for the recommendation and you will be informed of any referral arrangement and payment prior to any services being taken by you.

This takes the property off the market. Fees paid to the Auctioneer may be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property and be included in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Further clarification on this must be sought from your legal representative. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgement of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation from and all terms and conditions can be found in the Buyer Information Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department. Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed reserve price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid, both the Starting Bid and reserve price can be subject to change. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by London and South East Property Auction powered by iam-sold Ltd. A copy of the EPC will be available on request. EPC awaited.

Location

The property is situated only a 15 minute walk from Erith town center. Giving you an array shops and options for travel. Whether in be by bus to reach the ever popular Bexleyheath or the even more renowned Bluewater the choice is entertainment is endless, alternately if you need to commune to London you can get a train from ether Sladegreen station or Erith!

Our View

Ideally located for amenities and transport links. The new owner will want to add their own stamp to the property.

detailedDescription:
The Property

Purplebricks are delighted to offer to the market this superb one bedroom ground floor apartment. The property is located in the highly sought after Sydney Court development on Lansdown Road which is a Retirement Living Plus development.

This development offers so much more than other similar retirement homes in the area with every part of the development being presented to the highest of standards. Sydney Court features a highly rated onsite restaurant, hair salon, 24 hour on site manager, communal seating areas inside and outside in its well maintained gardens and more.

The apartment itself is located in such a sought after position being on the ground floor close to the entrance and just a short stroll from the sites highly rated restaurant. The apartment briefly comprises: A good sized entrance hall with great storage, a large living room featuring a feature fireplace and direct access onto the well maintained gardens, fully fitted kitchen, a beautifully presented shower room designed for easy access as well as a large master bedroom with walk in wardrobe.

Sydney Court backs on to Waring Park with beautiful views. There is an Arts and Adult Education Centre at the end of the road. The main Station Road, with restaurants and shops, is nearby, and Sidcup railway station is less than ½ a mile away. You can catch direct trains to London Charing Cross and Cannon Street, as well as Lewisham and Woolwich there is also a good local bus service.

This property and development as a whole is to such a high standard that internal viewing comes so highly recommended. *Chain Free*

detailedDescription:
** Guide Price £565,000 to £585,000**

Acorn are delighted to welcome to the market this substantial four bedroom semi detached family home located on one of Sidcup's well known roads.

Offered to the market in good decorative order and with the benefit of already being extended by the current owners the property offers 1753 sq.ft of space. The house is arranged over three floors, with the ground floor comprising large family lounge with doors leading into the open plan kitchen/dining room and French doors leading out to a West facing garden. There is also a generous sized utility room and separate W/C.

The first floor houses a four piece family bathroom suite and three well proportioned bedrooms, with the master bedroom being situated on the second floor and enjoying views over the rear garden. The property also benefits from an ultra modern en-suite. To the rear of the house is a good sized garden - 75ft which is mainly artificial lawn with a decked area, perfect for entertaining. To the rear of the garden there is also an out building/ Games room / Gym and to the front of the house is a paved drive.

Excellent schools within catchment include; Chatsworth Infant School, Burnt Oak Junior School, Our Lady Of The Rosary Catholic Primary School, Days Lane Primary School, Chislehurst and Sidcup Grammar School, Beths Grammar School and Hurstmere School. Sidcup and Falconwood stations are within walking distance providing regular services into London Bridge, Cannon Street and Charing Cross.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

Situated within the highly sought after development of Heath Court in New Eltham is this two bedroom apartment. The flat is set within well maintained communal grounds and is accessed via a secure entry phone system.

This apartment offers a perfect opportunity for all looking for an investment property with tenants in situ until December 2021!

Well presented throughout is this purpose built flat in a highly sought after, gated and secure, private development within New Eltham. The property offers two double bedrooms, a larger than average reception room, three piece family bathroom and fully fitted kitchen. The property offers double glazed windows throughout, an entry phone system and offered on an unfurnished basis. This well kept property is best suited for the every day commuter as New Eltham Rail station is only a short commute away. Enquire today for your earliest appointment.

Location:
New Eltham is an area of south east London, in the London Boroughs of Greenwich and Bexley. It lies south east of Eltham and North West of Sidcup. Home of many local amenities situated close to the railway station is the library, the Co-operative food store, a cluster of small shops and the Post Office. Larger chain stores may be found in nearby Eltham and Sidcup high streets. New Eltham rail station serves the area, with services to Central London and Gravesend. New Eltham is served by several Transport for London bus services connecting it with Beckenham, Bexleyheath, Bromley, Catford, Chislehurst, Eltham, Lewisham, New Addington, New Cross, Sidcup and Swanley. New Eltham is also home to many primary and pre-schools such as St. Olave's prep school, Crafty Wizards Pre-School, Wyborne Primary School and plenty more.

detailedDescription:
L&Q at Maiden Lane

Offering a stepping stone to homeownership in Crayford the first collection of 4 bedroom houses with private gardens and parking available to all properties launching late 2021

Shared Ownership homes launching late 2021
This is your chance to move into a beautifully designed home that has been built around people and is suitable for every kind of lifestyle. Located in a thriving and popular destination, living at Maiden Lane means you will be part of a rapidly evolving neighborhood.
The development has everything you could need on your doorstep making life that little bit more convenient.

What is Shared Ownership?
Under the Shared Ownership scheme, you part-own and part-rent your home, making it possible for first-time buyers and families to get on the property ladder.
The minimum share you can purchase is 25% and the maximum is 75%. You will usually pay a mortgage on the part you own and a subsidised rent on the part you don’t own. As your income rises, you can increase the share you own until you eventually own 100%.

Register your interest today to be kept up to date with any news about this new development!

detailedDescription:
Ewemove are delighted to present this stunning detached family residence with generous accommodation that is arranged over two storeys and is located in one of the most desirable roads on the Southside of Bexleyheath. Excellently located for some of the most sought after grammar schools in the area. This is a delightful example of a true family home offering flexible living space to suit most requirements.

The ground floor comprises of a stunning kitchen/ breakfast room with French doors to the rear providing a fabulous view of the garden, a formal dining room and a spacious living room leading to a sun-drenched conservatory. There is also a large utility room, cloakroom, garage access and a well proportioned shower room/WC.

To the first floor, there are four double bedrooms one with ensuite facilities, a fifth bedroom currently being used as an office and a stunning family bathroom with walk-in shower and modern free-standing roll top bath.

Externally, there are landscaped gardens to the front, side and rear with mature shrubs, trees and large expanses of lawn complete with a brick-built pizza oven and shed. The wrap-around patio has access from both the French doors of the conservatory and the kitchen, which is excellent for parties. There is a large seating area under the shade of a mature olive tree that is ideal for alfresco dining.

Parking consists of a driveway and a double length garage which has ample shelving and workbenches.

All in all, this really is a exceptional home with plenty of space for all of the family with every amenity on its doorstep and within easy reach of excellent transport links. Call our office today to register for our forthcoming open day.

detailedDescription:
We love this fabulous group of homes, five striking Grade II Listed houses that grab your attention the moment you see them. For us their lure is not just about the looks, the four floors of accommodation or the features they contain, it's about other things that also make life special.

Yes, this is a conservation area too, one of those locations that we preserve for future generations and just beside it is the wonderful Foots Cray Meadow, a wonderful park stretching across two hundred and forty acres. With the river Cray running through it, tree lined banks provide habitat for a variety of wildlife, you may see kingfishers here, certainly ducks and other water fowl. We have seen swans with cygnets, herons and many different birds. It is a wonderful place for a stroll and the scenery alters as you explore. Find the Penny Farthing Bridge and then head out to the far side of the meadow for a drink and a meal at a pub, there’s more than one route to take so reason to enjoy the stroll again and again.

Of those homes in the terrace, this was the first to receive planning permission for a ground floor extension to the kitchen. That application has lapsed but two other homes of these five have since had permission granted and so this may be something you wish to revisit and plan for the future.

Each house in the terrace has its own charm, uniqueness, different fireplaces, alterations across the centuries families have instigated and yet each retains that connection with the past, that feeling that you are part of an ever-continuing story, a custodian for the next generation.

Outside there is a rear garden that was awash with colour when we did our photo shoot, from a stunning camellia that obviously loves being here.
One of the most useful aspects of the rear garden is having space to park a car, an access lane serves just these five homes, easy to miss if you don't know to look for it.

For a family, this home has a sense of practicality, three double bedrooms, a shower room and a bathroom that is truly spacious.

Local shops are nearby as are schools, a nursery and a David Lloyd Gym just around the corner.

It is very easy to fall in love with such a home and We look forward to showing you around.

detailedDescription:
L&Q at Maiden Lane

Offering a stepping stone to homeownership in Crayford the first collection 3 bedroom houses with private gardens and parking available to all properties launching late 2021

Shared Ownership homes launching late 2021
This is your chance to move into a beautifully designed home that has been built around people and is suitable for every kind of lifestyle. Located in a thriving and popular destination, living at Maiden Lane means you will be part of a rapidly evolving neighborhood.
The development has everything you could need on your doorstep making life that little bit more convenient.

What is Shared Ownership?
Under the Shared Ownership scheme, you part-own and part-rent your home, making it possible for first-time buyers and families to get on the property ladder.
The minimum share you can purchase is 25% and the maximum is 75%. You will usually pay a mortgage on the part you own and a subsidised rent on the part you don’t own. As your income rises, you can increase the share you own until you eventually own 100%.

Register your interest today to be kept up to date with any news about this new development!

Why have a semi in Bexley when you can have this detached with 0.4 acres opposite the Arches in Northcary and surrounded by nurseries and garden centres and in excellent school catchment?

The Coach House, 4 bedroom detached with secluded drive and large 0.4 acre garden on the favoured North Cray Road, close to garden nurseries, country farms, shops and stables and within a 2 minute drive to the mainline train station at Bexley with fast train links to London Bridge and Charing Cross.

Harpers & Co are delighted to offer this chain free rare to market The Coach House, a building located adjacent to the listed Dower House located in an elevated position on the popular North Cray Road, in close proximity to Bexley Village and within excellent catchment to the areas best schools.
Please note this property is curteledge and not grade II listed.

This property has been in the same family for several decades and offers huge scope for those wanting a unique and elegant home that feels rural but is most convenient and well located. The large driveway in front of the charming brick facade opens into an open plan kitchen and breakfast room with utility room, large lounge and 4 bedrooms with 3 being doubles and a family bathroom. The estate could benefit from decoration but holds so much potential throughout.

The rear garden is unique and every so often, even we are amazed as to what some estates offer. The side access opens to a large paved patio area and rear access leads to the garden which is 0.4 acres of grass, mature boarders, trees, shrubs and a garden shed. For those wanting outside space, then the Coach House is exemplary in many ways offering a slice of the Village while being in close proximity to stables, several nurseries and good road links to the A2, M25 and Central London.

detailedDescription:
End of chain


Newly extended and fully refurbished four bedroom, two bathroom, semi detached house situated in a sought after location, convenientlu for Sidcup and New Eltham train stations, Dulverton and Longlands Primary Schools and Chislehurst and Sidcup Grammar School.

The property has been fully rewired and has a newly installed gas central heating system, together with a newly fitted kitchen, bathroom, ensuite shower room and cloakroom. The walls and ceilings have all been replastered, new doors and windows have been installed and there are new floor coverings throughout and a newly tiled roof.

Finished to an exceptionally high standard the property has been designed to provide open plan living accommodation on the ground floor with bi-fold doors leading to the rear garden, a separate lounge, kitchen with a large separate utility room and cloakroom/w.c. Upstairs there are four bedrooms with the main bedroom featuring an en-suite shower room and family bathroom.

Outside there is off street parking on a new driveway and a rear garden extending approximately 60ft.

detailedDescription:
** guide price £675,000 - £700,000 **

This is a very spacious 4 bedroom detached property in the sought after location of Dartford Road, between Bexley Village and Baldwyns Park. The property comes with fantastic sized rooms providing ample space for a growing family. There is also a great character and feel to the house with lovely views over woodlands to the rear.

From the moment you enter the property you are aware of both the space and natural light on offer. This is most noticeable in the lounge room thanks to the double glazed windows situated at the front and the rear conservatory that faces the garden.

The ground floor of this well decorated home boasts a beautifully modern and large kitchen, great size dining room to the side, a spacious living room, utility room, conservatory and ground floor bathroom. There is also the added bonus of the 4th bedroom being on the ground floor with its own shower room.

Up on the first floor is where you will find the three other double bedrooms, with the master bedroom having an En-suite and dressing room, a spacious family bathroom and copious amounts of storage space. The master bedroom also offers a Juliette balcony that over looks the garden and woodlands to rear.

Externally you have a colourful and mature secluded rear garden which is ideal for those family days in the sun and a summer house with power and light. To the front is the large driveway with room for multiple cars.

This is a true family home set within a true family location and to fully appreciate everything it has to offer an internal viewing is most certainly advised.

Location

Dartford Road in Bexley, is the location for this stunning four double bedroom, family home. Set close to Bexley Village, which is an area south east of London and is in the heart of the London borough of Bexley.

Transport facilities in Bexley really are second to none. Bexley train station serves the area with services to London Charing Cross, London Cannon Street and London Bridge. Bexley is served by several Transport for London bus services connecting with local areas such as Abbey Wood, Bexleyheath, Bromley, Chislehurst and many more. The A2 connects easily and quickly to the M25 and is just a short drive away.

Bexley has many wonderful schools including Old Bexley primary school, Maypole Primary School and Beth's grammar for boys which is linked with Townley grammar for girls. Also in catchment area for Grammar schools in surrounding towns i.e Dartford & Wilmington.

There is a vibrant buzz in the local village. Many delicatessens to choose from to enjoy a cup of coffee in to a large array of different restaurants serving different cuisines from all over the world. There are also many fine watering holes to choose from after enjoying a hearty meal. Bluewater & Lakeside Shopping Outlets are also a short drive away.

detailedDescription:
Virtual Viewing Available - Guide Price £500,000 to £525,000
Presented to the DA15 market in excellent condition is this charming 3 bedroom bungalow, offered chain free. Situated in a secluded Cul-de-sac just minutes away from the local shops, schools and bus links that Blackfen & Sidcup have to offer.

The property comprises a spacious living/dining room, with a feature fireplace and flooded by an abundance of natural light this makes for the perfect space to entertain. Further accommodation on offer is a light and airy kitchen, 2 generously sized double bedrooms, a further single bedroom and complete by a newly fitted four piece bathroom with the added bonus of a separate W/C.

Externally the property boasts a detached double garage with electric door, off street parking and well maintained south facing rear garden, mostly laid to lawn.

Further benefits include a new slate roof and central heating throughout.

Excellent schools within catchment include; Chatsworth Infant School, Burnt Oak Junior School, Our Lady Of The Rosary Catholic Primary School, Days Lane Primary School, Chislehurst and Sidcup Grammar School, Beths Grammar School, Blackfen School for Girls and Hurstmere School.

Sidcup and Welling stations are within walking distance providing regular services into London Bridge, Cannon Street and Charing Cross. As well as the 132 bus route to North Greenwich and 51 bus route.

detailedDescription:
Acorn are delighted to welcome to the market this extended, Semi Detached Bungalow on this popular road on the Bexleyheath/Belvedere borders.

Offered to the market in good order, the ground floor accommodation comprises two double bedrooms, shower room, bathroom, large front lounge, and a huge L shape Kitchen Diner, with fitted kitchen units and integrated appliances. The first floor comprises two further double bedrooms and WC. To the front of the house is a paved driveway which could comfortably fit three cars, and to the rear is a spacious garden, with raised patio and lower lawn section.

The property does present the potential to further extend, subject to usual planning permissions.

Orchard Avenue is within easy reach of Erith, Belvedere, Bexleyheath and Abbey Wood Stations, with the latter seen to be offering the Crossrail link. The property is also within close proximity to several reputable local schools.

detailedDescription:
L&Q at Maiden Lane

Shared Ownership homes launching late 2021
This is your chance to move into a beautifully designed home that has been built around people and is suitable for every kind of lifestyle. Located in a thriving and popular destination, living at Maiden Lane means you will be part of a rapidly evolving neighborhood.
The development has everything you could need on your doorstep making life that little bit more convenient.

What is Shared Ownership?
Under the Shared Ownership scheme, you part-own and part-rent your home, making it possible for first-time buyers and families to get on the property ladder.
The minimum share you can purchase is 25% and the maximum is 75%. You will usually pay a mortgage on the part you own and a subsidised rent on the part you don’t own. As your income rises, you can increase the share you own until you eventually own 100%.

Register your interest today to be kept up to date with any news about this new development!

detailedDescription:
Full description video tour available
Offered to the market is this large one bedroom period apartment that sits in the highly sought after Hollies development. The Hollies has always been sought after due to its parkland setting and convenient location just a short walk from Sidcup train station and shops. The apartment is part of an Edwardian conversion so offers a great feel of space with its tall ceilings and spacious entrance.

The property briefly comprises: A secure communal entrance which offers a grand Edwardian feel. The front door leads you into a large entrance hall big enough to also be used as a study or dining area. There is a spacious lounge which offers some great views of the Hollies parkland and this lounge flows nicely into the kitchen. The bedroom offers plenty of space and as well as a large main bathroom there is loft access. Externally there is allocated parking to the rear and a communal garden. The Hollies has access to a private leisure centre which features a swimming pool, gym, tennis courts and much more.

We feel this would make a great first time buy or investment. * Share of Freehold * Hollies location *

detailedDescription:
Full description Over 55's Only! Chain-Free and welcomed to the market is this well-presented and spacious Ground-Floor Retirement apartment. Located within walking distance to all nearby amenities such as Sidcup High St, Tesco Express, and local parks, this property further comes with a whole host of benefits including; a communal lounge for the residents, communal grounds to enjoy, and an abundance of open parking for family and friends to visit. EPC Rating 65 D

communal entrance The Communal Entrance welcomes you into the private complex via a secure entry-phone, and benefits from an array of electric storage heaters, as well as well-maintained carpeted hallways and lifts.
(A warden monitors the site from the hours 9:30am - 12:30pm Monday to Friday)

communal lounge & grounds 0' 0" x 0' 0" The private complex offers well-kept communal gardens with bin and mobility storage, a communal lounge area with kitchenette, and much more for the over 55's.

Entrance hall 7' 8" x 6' 8" (2.34m x 2.03m) A feature front door welcomes you into the ground-floor apartment and benefits from easy to clean wood-vinyl flooring, a wall-mounted electric storage heater, and a large airing cupboard.

Benefiting from double-glazed patio doors to rear (which provide access out into the courtyard and communal grounds), two electric-storage heaters, a fitted carpet, and an electric feature fireplace.

Boasting a range of matching wall and base units (with worktops over), a sink and drainer unit, plumbing and space for various utilities, alongside an integrated electric oven and 4 ring hob. Part-tiled walls and tile-effect flooring provide the finishing touches.

Master bedroom 15' 7" x 9' 2" (4.75m x 2.79m) Encompassing a large double-glazed window to rear, an electric-storage heater, a plush fitted carpet, and a range of built-in wardrobes, the Master Bedroom offers an abundance of space to make your own.

Bathroom 6' 8" x 5' 5" (2.03m x 1.65m) The Bathroom benefits from a 3 piece suite to include; W/C, a hand-wash basin, and a large walk-in shower. Fully-tiled walls and flooring allow for effortless upkeep.

Parking To the rear of the development is an abundance of open parking as well as the delightful communal grounds which accompany.

Comprising contemporary kitchens, spacious living areas, master bedrooms with en-suites, sumptuous family bathrooms, separate laundry cupboards (to selected plots), balconies plus allocated parking. These apartments also benefit from lift access, audio entry phone system, Fibre Optic high-speed internet connection plus much, much more.

What’s more Egerton Place offers an excellent opportunity to purchase your first home with the 40% Help to Buy scheme and only a 5% deposit.

Within walking distance is a fast train service from Slade Green/Erith train stations which provide fast and frequent services to London Bridge from approximately 35 minutes.

Bluewater shopping centre is approximately a 10 minute drive as is a number of good local schools nearby. Erith ticks more boxes then you may expect. For drivers the M25 is minutes away, London City Airport 16 miles away, Gatwick Airport 38 miles and City of London 18 miles.

All properties have a 10-year NHBC warranty.

detailedDescription:
Chain Free 2 Double Bedroom 3rd Floor Apartment with Panoramic Views of the River Thames & surrounding area.

Once inside you will find an Entrance Hall, Bathroom, 2 Double Bedrooms, Fitted Kitchen with Built In Oven & Hob, 20 Foot Lounge / Diner with Juliet Balcony. Nb From Bedroom 1 and the Balcony you have stunning River Views.

Some benefits worth noting are double glazing, gas central heating, entry phone system, secured parking space plus a visitors space.

The location of the property is also really good as you are close to local amenities including Bus Routes, Bexley College, Morrison Supermarket & The Riverside Shopping Centre plus Erith Train Station ( zone 6 ) is a 5 minute walk away and will get you into the London Stations (Cannon Street / Charing Cross) in approximately 40 minutes, and is also on the same line and only 2 stops from Abbey Wood Station which will have Crossrail running from it in the not too distant future.

In terms of running costs the seller has advised us that the current service charge is a £2126.00 per annum which includes your Building Insurance, £131.90 per annum Ground Rent plus an additional £202.00 per annum fee for the upkeep of the Thames Walkway, there are approximately 132 years left on the lease. The seller has advised that the Service charge for year 2021 will be £1994.11 so slightly down on the previous year. Nb Once you own the property you own a share of the Freehold.

Nb The property has been rented out for several years so it will need some tlc / Decorating when you move in.

If you have any questions or you would like to book a viewing then please feel free to call us and we will be happy to help you.

detailedDescription:
Guide Price £460,000 - £470,000
Stunning and luxurious apartment for the over 70’s. The complex has superb amenities including a Bistro style subsidised restaurant, hairdressing and beauty salon, laundry room, mobility scooter store and guest accommodation. A well-kept two bedroom larger than average second floor property located 0.6 miles to Sidcup Station and a short walk from Sidcup High Street. The property benefits from allocated parking and two private balconies overlooking a lovely park.

A welcoming hallway in modern tones leads in to the dining room/ lounge with access to a separate fully fitted kitchen with integrated appliances. There is also access direct from the lounge to the private balcony that overlooks a large park. The hall leads to two double bedrooms with homely feel as well as lots of natural light and access to the second balcony; the master bedroom with built in wardrobe and en suite wet room. The second shower room is also a wet room and offers a shower, basin and W.C. This property has the bonus of an allocated parking space.

The property located on Lansdown Road and is within 0.6 miles of Sidcup Station with regular services into Central London. Sidcup High Street is also within a short walk, offering a range of shops and restaurants. Offered specifically for the over 70s who wish to enjoy low maintenance independent living with the addition of communal facilities, social opportunities and on-site staff.

Lease Length: 995 Years, Service Charges: £10847 P/A*, Ground Rent: £1190 P/A*

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Summary... We are pleased to bring to the market this immaculate, period, ground floor one bedroom apartment. Welcome to The Beeches, situated in the desirable complex 'The Hollies', a former country estate, which is a 62 acre estate of semi-parkland, which has a mixture of modern and converted period properties. A stunning complex only half an hour from the capital by train… a serene location ideal for picnics and dog walking. A delightful residence with wraparound gardens for a couple or a perfect home from home. This immaculate Victorian apartment features a double bedroom with fantastic built-in storage, spacious lounge with south facing bay window and modern bathroom with shower over bath and electric underfloor heating, designated parking plus full access to exclusive members only countryside club, 'The Hollies' which includes an indoor heated swimming pool, tennis courts, gym and more!

Step inside... You enter the building via the communal, main doors to the front of the building with a secure buzzer system in place. Heading into the lobby, turn left and beyond double doors, you will be nicely greeted with the apartment which has been converted from the original boy's dormitories.

Entering the apartment by the front door, you will step into the entrance hall. Continue in front of you, beyond a door, you will reach the spacious, dual aspect, immaculate living room which features a neutral décor, high ceilings and a south-facing bay fronted window to the front which brings in lots of day light and benefits from the sun's warmth for most of the day along with space for a dining table. A beautiful space to enjoy, relax and entertain within day or night.

From the living room, head back towards the front aspect and turn right into the fitted kitchen. You will find a fantastic range of wall and base units for storage, with the sink overlooking the beautiful green at the front, integrated hob, oven and slimline dishwasher along with space for a washing machine and fridge/freezer.

From the kitchen, turn right into the entrance hall and right again into the double bedroom. This generous bedroom features a fantastic large window to the front bathing this space in plenty of natural daylight, built in wardrobes and drawers plus a further two storage cupboards which are floor to ceiling in height – brilliant for additional storage needs.

From the bedroom, turn right and then left into the modern, tiled bathroom. A lovely mixture of dark blue and white décor compliments this stylish bathroom which features a bath with shower over, basin, WC and electric underfloor heating.

Step outside... The Beeches situated within The Hollies which is an 62 acre estate made up of semi-parkland which has a mixture of modern and converted period properties.

The complex was once a Victorian estate and was converted to an orphanage in 1910 when further properties and buildings were added, circa 1990 the estate was converted to the stunning residential complex you see today. The Beeches is one of four similar blocks including The Firs, The Limes and The Oaks, this fantastic complex is not only home to beautiful green spaces but also The Hollies Countryside Club. The fantastic exclusive members only leisure centre includes an unlimited use of the indoor heated swimming pool, gym, pool and snookers tables, table tennis and also features a nail bar, hairdressers and jacuzzi and sauna, a wonderful place on your doorstep approx.. 200m away from the property across the green. Imagine having this luxury health and leisure centre right on your doorstep… only a stone's throw away?

This stunning period apartment is in a quiet location served by a 'no through road' and is surrounded by wraparound communal landscaped gardens and benefits from designated off road parking to the front located close to the main entrance doors, with further parking to the rear of the building plus additional private resident and guest paring to the rear and permit free parking along the road. Situated across from a beautiful green space, the building comprises of 10 apartments in total, with a buzzer entry system in place, CCTV in the main door, lobby and car park for added peace of mind along with a handy bin store and recycling bins to the rear of the building.

Location location location... The property is located in Sidcup, within the London Borough of Bexley in South East London and is closest to Chislehurt, Blackfen and New Eltham and is approximately 11.3 miles south-east of Charing Cross and lies two miles north-west of the Kent border, and was historically in the county of Kent. The property is located around 10 minutes walk away from the nearest train station which serves London Bridge in 20-25 minutes, along with local shops with various bus routes and a local park around 5 minutes away.

The name derived from 'Cetecopp' meaning ''flat topped hill''. Sidcup town includes a large leisure centre, a number of prep and grammar schools as well as a state primary and secondary schools and Queen Mary's Hospital whilst the bustling high street features a wealth of amenities from stores and supermarkets, as well as a host of cool and quirky independent boutiques. Sidcup is only 12 miles outside of London, yet on the edge of beautiful, open countryside. Fantastic transport links include the M25, A2 and A20 and is most popular amongst professionals working in the city with quick travel times into the heart of the capital.

Agents notes... We have been advised by the seller that the property is Leasehold and there are 95 years remaining on the lease with a tripartite agreement.

Service charges and ground rent charges apply with service charges for 2020/2021 being £2,072 and ground rent is £205 payable half yearly with the ground rent being reviewed every 25 years. In addition, we have been made aware that the freeholders of the building block are in the process of extending the lease to 999 years. We have not seen documents to confirm any information relating to the leasehold.

Upon purchasing the property, we have been advised that new owners of the apartment will receive a 20% freehold share of the building block and will be required to obtain a compulsory, estate members only membership to The Hollies Countryside Club, for 2020/2021 the amount payable, per household is £850 per annum.

Please be advised that the photos of The Hollies Countryside Club are used as representation purposes and we cannot claim these as our photos.

If you would like any further information relating to the above, please contact us directly on .

A pre-recorded walk around video tour is available for this property.

We are open for business. Viewings and valuations are possible, with ppe required by all parties please. The members of two properties are permitted only, in one property at any given time. As face to face viewings and valuations are not possible for some and to spare wasted journeys for others we are offering FaceTime or WhatsApp Video viewings and valuations at most of our properties (4g/wifi allowing) Where there is no signal we can conduct a video tour of the property to send to you.

Please note that our viewers are required to be financially verified before viewing our properties as an extra measure to safeguard them, our vendors and our staff.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to call the team. Keep Safe.

detailedDescription:
Offered to the market chain free, this fantastic five bedroom detached house is set in a fantastic location.

Set over three floors, this huge house comprises of two reception rooms, a beautiful kitchen / dining room, a family bathroom, separate w.c and five good sized bedrooms, one of which has a handy en suite. There is also a large private garden to the rear and a private balcony on the first floor.

Situated in the ever popular Crayford area, London Road is one of its principal tree lined streets, a short walk away from a number of local independent shops, restaurants and other amenities. This is a great spot to live in, located between Bexleyheath and Dartford, all much sought after areas. Set in a residential location with many transport links on your doorstep, London Bridge can be accessed in 40 minutes approx. You will be spoilt for choice with the independent shops, bars and restaurants of Crayford all within easy reach. Not to mention the beautiful expanses of Central Park.

The property is also offered with full planning permission for a three storey rear extension and alterations to the existing house to provide four self contained residential units comprising one studio, one three bedroom flat and two one bedroom flats. Provision of associated car and cycle spaces.



Contact Kallars to arrange your vieiwng today.

detailedDescription:
** guide price - £400,000 - £425,000 **

Acorn are delighted to welcome to the market this well presented Semi Detached family home, set within this ever popular Cul De Sac.

Summary

For Sale By Online Auction. Starting Bid 160,000. Terms and conditions apply.

We welcome to the market this one bedroom top floor flat located within 1/4 of a mile of Belvedere Station. The property benefits from communal entrance lobby with lift and stairs to the fifth floor. Access via the entrance hall which leads into a modern open lounge/kitchen space with double glazed windows to rear which has extensive views over the local area. Other benefits include double bedroom with built in wardrobe, modern bathroom and kitchen with integrated appliances. The property also benefits from a car space, communal gardens.

Lobby

Via security door, lift and stairs to fifth floor landing, fitted carpet

Entrance Hall

Via solid door, cupboard housing water tank, video enrty phone, solid wood flooring with doors leading to

Lounge/Diner

Double glazed window to rear, electric radiator, solid wood flooring

Kitchen

Fully fitted with matching wall and base units electric hob and oven, overhead extractor, stainless steel dual sink unit, integrated fridge/freezer/dishwasher and solid wood flooring.

Bedroom One

Double glazed window to rear, electric radiator, built in wardrobes and solid wood flooring.

Bathroom

Panel bath with separate shower over local tiling, pedestal wash hand basin, low level wc extractor fan and wood flooring.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon agreement of sale, the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit and or reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of between 2,400 and 6,000 inc VAT dependant on geographical location and contract type) Full terms and conditions are available on The Auctioneers website.

The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs. The Auctioneer may believe it necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

detailedDescription:
Take a look at this fantastic two bedroom top floor flat finished to a great standard. This home comprises a large and bright and airy lounge and dining room which gives access to a modern fitted kitchen. You have two great sized bedrooms with the main bedroom having its own en-suite shower room and there is also a separate family bathroom too.

Welling has been a favoured town among families for many years, with access to Bexley borough’s four grammar schools as well as the 78-hectare Danson Park, with its historic house, boating lake, sports pitches, splash park and pub.

The town’s heart is in the High Street, where you’ll find shops, pubs, restaurants and the mainline train station, with its direct trains to London. Don’t miss Crook Log Leisure Centre – Welling’s sports and pool complex.

detailedDescription:
Full Description

This studio apartment is in move in condition and situated in a highly desirable area. Briefly comprising of a fitted kitchen, bed/sitting room and bathroom with an allocated car parking space.

Situated in a very convenient location with Erith Railway Station just 4 minutes walk away (with trains into Central London taking just 30 minutes), and Belvedere and Slade Green Stations both just 2 miles away. The main road network is easily accessible from the apartment and there’s a vast choice of local and city bus services. Erith Town Centre is just a few minutes walk away with a good choice of shops, cafes, takeaways and amenities; and just beyond that is Erith Pier and Erith Riverside Gardens.

Communal Hallway

Entrance is via the main door leading into a communal hallway and staircase. Allocated downstairs mail box.

Private Entrance Hallway

The front door of the property leads into a small private entrance hallway. From here all rooms within the apartment are accessed. Laminate flooring. Storage cupboard. Wall mounted lighting. Coving.

Bed / Sitting Room

A bright room with an attractive box bay window. Wall mounted lighting. Storage heater. Coving. Laminate flooring.

Kitchen

An archway from the bed/sitting room leads through into the kitchen. Featuring a range of floor and wall mounted cupboards. Integrated oven and hob with extractor fan. Washing machine. Stainless steel sink with draining board. Space for a washing maching. Tiled splashbacks. Lino flooring. Mains sockets. Coving. Ceiling mounted lighting. Window.

Bathroom

Sink, toilet and built in shower. Mirror over sink. Cupboard under sink. Lino flooring. Ceiling mounted light fitting. Walls part tiled. Shelving. Extractor fan. Towel rail. Wall mounted drying rack.

Outside

Allocated parking space

detailedDescription:
Acorn are pleased to present to the market this immaculate two double bedroom, detached home designed by an award winning architect and completed to the highest of specifications boasting a rotational car turntable driveway with alarmed electric gates, underfloor heating throughout as well as built in amp system with built in speakers throughout the ground floor!

Comprising an open plan layout to the ground floor the living/kitchen area boasts stunning wrap around windows giving ample light benefitting from in-built venetian blinds. A stunning modern kitchen with white quartz worktops and backsplash, integrated appliances and Kitchen Island with a built in wine cooler.

Further to the ground floor you will find a utility room with space for washing machine and dryer, W.C and a beautiful walnut staircase with glass panelling.

To the first floor the large 17ft master bedroom benefits from a modern marble shower room and double glazed powder coated aluminium sliding doors to the private balcony. The second bedroom also benefits from a marble en-suite bathroom with oval bath tub and double glazed, powder coated sliding doors to the balcony.

This extremely spacious property has been well thought out by both the current builder and architect making this home as modern as can be. Located close to a number of local amenities including Erith town centre with its fast transport links into London as well as a number of local schools. Call us now to arrange a viewing!
